tika-vin09t:13_10: paccayādīnaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ sakkacca karaṇaṃ sakkāro, tesaṃ.
tika-vin09t:14_8: “Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca pubbācariyasīhānañcā”ti avatvā kasmā visuṃ vuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t:14_10: Vatthuttayassa hi paṇāmakaraṇassa antarāyanivāraṇaṃ payojanaṃ attano nissayabhūtānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paṇāmakaraṇassa upakāraññutādassanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:14_11: Tena buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca vanditvā, ca-
tika-vin09t:14_13: Atha vā “vanditvā”ti cetovandanaṃ dassetvā tato “namo katvā”ti vācāvandanā,
tika-vin09t:15_3: Yathā ca sattānaṃ khajjabhojjaleyyapeyyavasena catubbidhopi āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati,
tika-vin09t:15_4: evaṃ yoginopi cātubhūmakaṃ kusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti.
tika-vin09t:15_7: tena mokkhappavesāya nibbānasacchikiriyāya mukhaṃ upāyoti attho.
tika-vin09t:16_5: kiṃ dussīlena vā duṭṭhena vā alajjinā vā yācitena vaṇṇanā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin09t:17_0: Nāmenāti attano guṇanāmena. Saddalakkhaṇasubhato, vinicchayasubhato, viññeyyasubhato ca subhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:20_2: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:20_3: Ettheva yāvatatiyānusāvanakathāvasāne atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:20_6: Tattha pubbe vuttaṃ pacchā āgatasuttena virujjhati.
tika-vin09t:20_10: “Āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:20_11: Tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādinā suuddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti etaṃ uddesalakkhaṇaṃ idhāpi khandhakepi vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:20_12: Tasmā “phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne avuttampi ānetvā gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t:20_15: Apica “nidānuddeso”ti padaṃ uddharitvā nidānuddesaṃ dassetukāmopi “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t:20_17: āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti pāṭhavasena āgataṃ nidānaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā upari aṭṭhakathāvasena yojetabbaṃ pāḷiṃ idha yojetvā “tatthāyasmante pucchāmi…pe…
tika-vin09t:20_18: dhārayāmī”ti nidānapāḷiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā puna “tattha nidānuddeso”ti uddhaṭapadavasena saṅkhepato nidānuddesalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t:20_19: dassetuṃ “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:20_20: tasmā evaṃ upari ca khandhake ca,
tika-vin09t:20_21: atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:21_0: Savanāṇattivacananti ettha saṅghanavakatarena vattuṃ ayuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t:21_2: “Pātimokkhuddesakena evaṃ vattabba”nti bhagavatā vuttattā bhagavatova āṇatti,
tika-vin09t:21_5: Theropi pana uddisituṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ “therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:21_6: Iminā suttena navakataro na labhatīti ce?
tika-vin09t:22_0: Yathā catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadāpavāraṇāabbhānāni sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t:22_1: evaṃ “atirekavīsativaggena imaṃ nāma kammaṃ kātabba”nti avatvā atirekavacanattā aññaṃ atthaṃ sūceti,
tika-vin09t:22_5: vīsativaggena na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t:22_6: Ettha “dasavaggena abbhānakammamattaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vadantena catupañcavaggena karaṇīyānipi dasavaggena kātuṃ anuññātāni.
tika-vin09t:22_15: Sabbappakārena pana atirekavīsatianatirekavīsativagge vuttepi dīpitaṃ hotīti vajirabuddhittherena likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:23_4: “Pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā evā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ tato paraṃ pavāraṇādivasassa natthitāya kataṃ.
tika-vin09t:23_5: Uddhaṃ pakatiuposathe vuttena pakaticārittena saddhiṃ idampi.
tika-vin09t:24_0: “Nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā”ti na vattabbaṃ “tividhasampattiyuttā”ti vuttattāti ce?
tika-vin09t:24_7: Apica “tividhasampattiyuttā”ti sampayogaṅgesu dassetvā puna tameva pahānaṅgesu dassetuṃ “nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:24_8: Nadisamuddajātassaresu sammatasīmāto kammāni na vipajjanti udakukkhepasīmattāti “vipattisīmāyo nāmā”ti kasmā vuttāti ce?
tika-vin09t:24_9: Sesalakkhaṇāni sampādetvā nadiyaṃ sīmāya baddhāya udakapariyantaṃ katvā sīmāgatattā puna taṃ nadiṃ anto
tika-vin09t:24_10: katvā taḷāke kate sace tassā sīmāya kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
tika-vin09t:24_12: Yasmā pana evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t:25_0: Vīsativaggakaraṇīyattā saṅghakammassa kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:25_3: Tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvāti majjhe ṭhatvā diyaḍḍhaṃ katvā tiyojanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:26_0: Rāsikataṃ paṃsupi rukkhesu jātesu suddhapaṃsupabbato hoti.
tika-vin09t:26_3: Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito”ti iminā kuṭasarāvādīsu ropitaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t:26_4: tato apanetvā pana taṅkhaṇampi bhūmiyaṃ ropito vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:26_6: Khandhaṃ chinditvā ropite pana etaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin09t:26_11: tasmā khuddakopi mahantopi vaṭṭati evāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:27_0: Jātassare paripuṇṇameva udakaṃ nimittūpagaṃ disvā aparipuṇṇaṃ antarā ṭhitibhūtaṃ “jātassare sammatā”ti vuttaṃ vipattiṃ na āpajjatīti “nadiyā sammatā,
tika-vin09t:27_2: jātassare sammatā”ti etthāpi loṇī na gahitā.
tika-vin09t:27_3: Baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvāti etthāpi “nadiyā vā,
tika-vin09t:27_5: samudde vā jātassare vā”ti etthāpi na gahitā.
tika-vin09t:27_8: “Yopi nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ vā bhinditvā nikkhantaudakena kato sobbho etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin09t:27_9: ayampi jātassaroyevā”ti vuttattā jātassaraggahaṇena gahitāti tattha tattha avuttā.
tika-vin09t:27_10: “Yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette”ti vuttattā aññampi gāmaṃ anto katvā samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsammannanakāle tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhū āgacchantu vā mā vā, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:28_0: Agamanapathesūti ettha ekadivasena gantvā paccāgantuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhāneti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:29_2: tato gahetabbo “yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti,
tika-vin09t:29_4: tattha ṭhatvā uposathādikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:29_7: Yo pana kenaci antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:30_0: “Aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī”ti vuttattā atikkamitvā ṭhito na kopetīti dīpitameva hotīti upatissatthero,
tika-vin09t:30_1: taṃ pana “dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin09t:30_4: Antoudakukkhepasīmāya upacāratthāya ṭhapitaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedaṃ anatikkamitvāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t:31_0: “Sabhāgavatthunā lahukāpatti”nti vuttattā sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin09t:31_1: Na vaṭṭati desanāgāminiṃ sandhāya idha vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:31_2: Tasmā eva samuccayakkhandhake “sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvikātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:31_9: evaṃ tīhi dvīhipi aññaṃ suddhaṃ passitvā “paṭikarissāmā”ti vatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:31_10: Ekenāpi “parisuddhaṃ labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t:31_11: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “sāmanto bhikkhu evamassa vacanīyoti ettha sabhāgo eva vattabbo.
tika-vin09t:31_13: tasmā tassa avatvā ito vuṭṭhahitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposatho kātabboti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t:31_14: vutta”nti vatvā tassa appaṭikkhittattā vaṭṭatīti dīpitameva.
tika-vin09t:31_16: tadā tassa santike”ti vuttattā lahukasseva anuññātattā samuccayakkhandhake vuttattā sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin09t:31_17: pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:32_0: Devabrahmā pana “tiracchānagato”ti padaṃ ṭhapetvā yena kenaci padena asaṅgahitāpi iminā saṅgahitāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t:33_0: “Cātumāsiniyaṃ pana pavāritānaṃ santike anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā vuṭṭhavassena vā”ti avatvā “anupagatena
tika-vin09t:33_2: Vuṭṭhavasso pana tasmiṃ kāle anupagatattā “anupagato”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatoti.
tika-vin09t:33_3: Sabbāya vuṭṭhitāya sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gate sannipātetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin09t:33_4: ekacce sannipātetvā pārisuddhiṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t:33_5: Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hotīti.
tika-vin09t:33_8: sace purimikāya upagatehi pacchimikāya upagatā thokatarā ceva honti samasamā ca,
tika-vin09t:33_12: aññesaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā”ti vuttattā adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ sīmaṃ pavisitvā kātuṃ na sakkāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:34_0: “Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”nti idaṃ na ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:34_6: Na hi taṃ ñattiyā anto karīyatīti.
tika-vin09t:34_7: Evaṃ sante netaṃ vattabbanti āpajjati payojanābhāvāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:34_10: Idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ akatvā uposathakammaṃ karonto saṅgho,
tika-vin09t:34_12: Tasmiñhi khette atikkante sammajjanādikaraṇe āpattimokkho na hoti uposathakammato pubbe kattabbakammākaraṇapaccayattā tassā āpattiyā.
tika-vin09t:34_14: tasmā pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”ti vattukāmo paṭhamameva pārisuddhāpārisuddhipaccayaṃ pubbakiccaṃ sarāpeti.
tika-vin09t:34_19: Tattha akatapakkhe tāva pārisuddhiārocanakkamanidassanatthaṃ parato “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin09t:34_21: katapakkhe “asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti ca vakkhati.
tika-vin09t:35_5: Uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatassa kattabbākāradassanatthañca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:35_6: Padhānagharavāsino padhānagharaṃ pavisitukāmā attano sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ chandaṃ datvā sace saṅgho sannipatati,
tika-vin09t:35_10: Pañcasu bhikkhūsu ekasmiṃ vihāre vasantesu ekassa chandapārisuddhiṃ āharitvā catunnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ
tika-vin09t:35_11: anuññātattā sannipatite chando gahetabbo ārocetabboti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ viya.
tika-vin09t:35_14: “sace pubbe chandaṃ datvā bahisīmāgato puna pavisati,
tika-vin09t:35_16: tassa payogo sīmāsammutivasena veditabbo”ti ca “chandadāne tikkhattuṃ vacane idaṃ payojanaṃ –
tika-vin09t:35_19: tatiyaṃ chandahārakassa dukkaṭamocanaṃ dīpetī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:35_22: tathā sāpi na katthaci gacchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:35_23: Itarathā visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ hotīti ācariyena gahitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:36_0: “Na hi taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pubbe dassitattā “idampi hi ubhaya”nti kasmā vuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t:36_2: ime pana dve therena vā pātimokkhuddesakena vā ñattiṭṭhapanakena vā yena vā tena vā kātabbānīti ca,
tika-vin09t:36_3: sammajjanādīni tattha tattha tādisāni payojanāni nipphādenti,
tika-vin09t:36_4: ime pana dve tattha tattha na kiñci kammaṃ sādhenti,
tika-vin09t:36_5: tasmā “kiṃ iminā”ti avatvā kātabbamevāti dassetuñca “idampi hi ubhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:36_6: “Āyasmantānaṃ pāde vandatī”ti gaṇavasena vatvā puggalavasena na vuttaṃ tena ārocetabbassa aññassa abhāvā.
tika-vin09t:37_0: Saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti saṅghena uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin09t:37_1: Samaggassa hi saṅghassāti ettha samaggabhāvassa kāyasāmaggikāraṇattā natthi dosoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin09t:37_4: bhante”ti hi iminā cittasāmaggiṃ dīpeti savane sabbehi ekībhūtabhāvato.
tika-vin09t:38_0: Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatīti ettha anādariyavasena āpajjanto eva alajjī hoti,
tika-vin09t:38_2: Āpattiṃ parigūhatīti ettha lajjāya parigūhanto alajjī na hoti,
tika-vin09t:38_3: ‘kiṃ iminā’ti anādariyavasena parigūhanto hotī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:39_3: Pārājikāpattiṃ āpanno hi sace attano sāpattikabhāvaṃ pakāseti,
tika-vin09t:39_5: tassa ca gihibhāvena vā sāmaṇerabhāvena vā suddhi hotīti.
tika-vin09t:40_0: Ekacce ācariyā nāma dhammabhāriko kira ācariyo.
tika-vin09t:40_3: Tathā pāṭhe anāgatattā kevalaṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvita”nti padameva disvā “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin09t:40_6: “Asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti idampi tamevatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin09t:40_7: “Tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante parisuddhāti vedissāmī”ti idampi tamevāti evamatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin09t:41_1: Etaṃ sandhāyāti ettha “sakimpi anusāvita”nti padassa vacanena tikkhattuṃ anusāvanā kātabbāti ettakameva dīpitaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin09t:42_0: Imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin09t:43_8: etena na kevalaṃ saṅghamajjhe evāyaṃ musāvādo sambhavati,
tika-vin09t:43_9: atha kho ettha vuttalakkhaṇena asatipi “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”tiādividhāne gaṇuposathepi sāpattiko
tika-vin09t:43_10: hutvā uposathaṃ kattukāmo anārocetvā tuṇhībhūtova ce karoti,
tika-vin09t:43_11: ayaṃ sampajānamusāvādāpattiṃ āpajjatīti imassatthassa āvikaraṇato lakkhaṇavacanaṃ kiretanti vuttanti takkikā.
tika-vin09t:43_12: Aññathā “gaṇamajjhe vā”ti na vattabbanti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:43_14: Ārocento hi “saṅghassa ārocemī”ti adhippāyena āvikaronto saṅghamajjhe āvikaroti nāma,
tika-vin09t:43_15: ubhatopasse nisinnānaṃ ārocento gaṇamajjhe āvikaroti nāma,
tika-vin09t:43_16: “ekasseva ārocessāmī”ti adhippāyena āvikaronto ekapuggale āvikaroti nāma.
tika-vin09t:43_18: paṭikarissāmīti evaṃ kate yāva vematiko hoti,
tika-vin09t:43_21: Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ vā na vāti neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t:43_24: Tathā ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmīti ettha ca sakalasaṅghe sabhāgāpattiṃ āpanne,
tika-vin09t:47_0: Idha pana ṭhatvā sikkhāpadānaṃ kamabhedo pakāsetabbo. Kathaṃ –
tika-vin09t:47_5: Tattha bhagavatā rājagahe bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena pātimokkhuddesassa yo desanākkamo anuññāto,
tika-vin09t:47_6: taṃ desanākkamaṃ anukkamantova mahākassapo paṭhamaṃ pārājikuddesaṃ pucchi,
tika-vin09t:47_11: Tato paraṃ tayo āpattikkhandhe saṅgahetuṃ vinā gaṇanaparicchedena sekhiyadhamme pucchi.
tika-vin09t:47_12: Āpattikkhandhe sabhāgato paṭṭhāya pucchanto vīsatikhandhake pucchi.
tika-vin09t:47_13: Nidānuddesantogadhānaṃ vā sarūpena anuddiṭṭhānaṃ pucchanatthaṃ khandhake pucchi.
tika-vin09t:47_14: Etena khandhake paññattā thullaccayāpi saṅgahitā honti.
tika-vin09t:47_17: Ubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakato pana uccinitvā tadā parivāro visuṃ pāḷi kato,
tika-vin09t:47_18: imameva vacanaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “eteneva upāyena khandhakaṃ parivārepi āropayiṃsū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:47_20: Puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā upāli vissajjesī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:47_22: Vissajjanto pana āyasmā upāli niravasesaṃ dassento khandhakaparivāre anto katvā desesi.
tika-vin09t:47_23: Gaṇasajjhāyakāle pana tadā khandhakaparivārā visuṃ pāḷi katāti ayamettha desanākkamo.
tika-vin09t:48_0: Yadi evaṃ nidānuddeso paṭhamadesanāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:48_4: Akusalābyākatānaṃ āpattīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammasamparāyikāsavaṭṭhāniyattā yathābhūtaṃ sīlasaṃvarakena parivajjanena
tika-vin09t:48_5: pahātabbattā pahānakkamopettha sambhavati “tāvadeva cattāri akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitabbānī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin09t:48_6: Tathā “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti vacanato yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhanasikkhanena paṭipattikkamopi sambhavati.
tika-vin09t:48_8: evamimehi tīhi kamehi desetabbānametesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ uppattikkamo sambhavati.
tika-vin09t:48_10: taṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne eva vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhamma”ntiādinā nayena bhikkhunīnampi paññattaṃ.
tika-vin09t:48_11: Yato bhikkhunīnaṃ taṃ anuppannapaññatti na siyā,
tika-vin09t:48_12: tato anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthīti parivāravacanaṃ na virujjhati.
tika-vin09t:48_13: Ettāvatā purimena kamattayena yaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:48_14: taṃ pārājikuddese paṭhamuppannattā methunadhammapārājikaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ desetukāmo āyasmā upālitthero
tika-vin09t:48_15: “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharatī”ti vesāliyameva pāpetvā ṭhapesi.
tika-vin09t:49_0: Idāni sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t:49_3: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti evaṃ sauddesaanuddesabhedato duvidhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:49_4: Tattha pātimokkhe sarūpato āgatā pañca āpattikkhandhā sauddesapaññatti nāma.
tika-vin09t:49_6: Tattha yassā paññattiyā anto āpattiyā saha,
tika-vin09t:50_1: Tattha adassitāpattikā nāma aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:50_2: “Pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti hi puggalova tattha dassito, nāpatti.
tika-vin09t:50_3: Dassitāpattikā nāma bhikkhunipātimokkhe āgatā sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā.
tika-vin09t:50_4: “Ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti hi tattha āpatti dassitā saddhiṃ puggalena.
tika-vin09t:52_7: paccattaṃ tāva dvīsu aniyatesu upayogena missaṃ,
tika-vin09t:52_15: Sesesu paṭhamāniyataṃ ṭhapetvā ādimhi “yo pana bhikkhū”ti evamāgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t:52_16: dutiyāniyataṃ ṭhapetvā paṇītabhojanasamaṇuddesatatiyacatutthapāṭidesanīyasikkhāpadesu majjhe “yo pana bhikkhū”ti evamāgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t:52_17: dubbacakuladūsakasaṃsaṭṭhasikkhāpadesu ādimhi kevalaṃ “bhikkhū”ti āgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t:52_18: bhedānuvattakasikkhāpade majjhe āgataṃ paccattaṃ vā aññāya vibhattiyā amissameva hoti.
tika-vin09t:53_3: rājasikkhāpade karaṇasāmipaccattehīti upayogo tidhā misso hoti.
tika-vin09t:53_6: aṭṭhasu sāminā missanti karaṇaṃ dvidhā missaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:53_9: Atirekapattabhesajjasikkhāpadesu aggahitaggahaṇena sāmivibhatti amissāva hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:54_0: Pañcadhā ca tidhā ceva, dvidhā cepi tathekadhā;
tika-vin09t:56_0: Evaṃ tāva yathāvuttesu sauddesapaññattisaṅkhātesu sikkhāpadesu aggahitaggahaṇena paññāsuttaresu tisatesu
tika-vin09t:56_5: Avasesesu tiṃsatiyā sikkhāpadesu missopayogakaraṇāni pañca honti,
tika-vin09t:57_8: Visesakāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade sampatte āvibhavissati.
tika-vin09t:57_9: Evaṃ tāva sauddesapaññattiṃ ñatvā sesavinayapiṭake yā kāci paññatti anuddesapaññattīti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:58_1: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādikā padabhājane sandissamānāpatti padabhājanasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. “Na ca,
tika-vin09t:58_8: divāpaṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti evamādi vinītavatthusikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:58_11: anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”ti evamādi paṭikkhepasikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:59_0: Yasmā pana tena tena paṭikkhepena “yo pana bhikkhu samaggaṃ saṅghaṃ adhammasaññī bhindeyya,
tika-vin09t:59_2: Yo pana bhikkhu duṭṭhacitto bhagavato jīvamānakasarīre lohitaṃ uppādeyya,
tika-vin09t:59_3: pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti sikkhāpadāni paññattāni honti.
tika-vin09t:59_13: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idameva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti sādhakaṃ hoti. “Paṇḍako,
tika-vin09t:59_16: upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti evamādīsu pana upajjhāyādīnaṃ dukkaṭameva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t:59_20: Tathā “na acchinne theve pakkamitabba”nti evamādikañca paṭikkhepasikkhāpadameva nāma.
tika-vin09t:60_4: Idaṃ tesaṃ vibhattikammakkhaṇe apaññattattā avijjamānampi bhagavato vacanena visuddhakkhaṇepi vijjamānaṃ jātanti eke.
tika-vin09t:60_5: “Bhedānuvattake desāpehī”ti vacanato sesabhedānuvattakānaṃ “yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghabhedakānaṃ anuvatteyya,
tika-vin09t:60_6: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:60_9: Yathāha “paññatte taṃ upāli mayā āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgantukavattaṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t:60_10: evaṃ supaññatte kho mayā upāli sikkhāpade”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:60_11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya,
tika-vin09t:60_12: pācittiya”nti iminā suttena bhikkhunī nacceyya vā gāyeyya vā vādeyya vā,
tika-vin09t:60_13: pācittiyanti evamādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhakathāya dissamānaṃ āpattijātaṃ vinayakammaṃ vā avuttasiddhisikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:60_14: Chabbidhampetaṃ chahi ākārehi uddesārahaṃ na hotīti anuddesasikkhāpadaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:60_16: pañcahi uddesehi yathāsambhavaṃ visabhāgattā thullaccayadubbhāsitānaṃ sabhāgavatthukampi dukkaṭathullaccayadvayaṃ
tika-vin09t:63_0: Pubbe vattabbavidhānā-bhāvato ca ādito yopanena sahā”ti. –
tika-vin09t:64_2: ye te aniddiṭṭhakārakā pubbe vuttappabhedā sukkavisaṭṭhiādayo sikkhāpadavisesā,
tika-vin09t:64_3: tesu adhippāyakammavatthupuggalapayoge apekkhāya bhāvato kārako na niddiṭṭho tesaṃ sāpekkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t:64_4: Taṃ sabbaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āvibhavissati,
tika-vin09t:64_5: idha pana pārājikapaññattiyaṃ apekkhāya abhāvato kārako niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t:64_6: Yo pana kārako “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmi”ntiādīsu viya pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato karaṇādivasena
tika-vin09t:64_8: Tattha niddisiyamāno sesadutiyāniyatapaṇītabhojanaṃ samaṇuddesatatiyacatautthapāṭidesanīyesu viya majjhe aniddisitvā “na heva kho pana…pe…
tika-vin09t:64_9: obhāsitu”ntiādi viya pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato eva ādimhi niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t:64_10: Ādimhi niddisiyamānopi pubbe vuttappabhedesu bhedānuvattakādīsu pañcattiṃsesu sikkhāpadesu viya aniddisitvā
tika-vin09t:64_11: pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato eva “yo pana bhikkhū”tiāditova yopana-
tika-vin09t:64_13: Evaṃ niddisiyamānopi so yasmā “yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyu”ntiādi āpatti viya parappabhavaṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati,
tika-vin09t:64_15: Methunadhammāpattipi parappabhavā “dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī”ti vacanatoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin09t:64_21: Ayamattho catasso methunadhammapaccayāti aṭṭhavatthukaṃ sandhāya “chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayā”ti ca parivāre vuttavacanena sādhetabbo.
tika-vin09t:65_2: Nayadassanatthaṃ āditova “bhikkhū hontī”ti bahuvacananiddesaṃ katvā puna “eko vā dve vā tayo vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:65_3: aññathā na tato uddhaṃ “anuvattakā hontī”ti āpajjati.
tika-vin09t:65_6: Yaṃ pana sattasatikakkhandhake “saṅgho cattāro pācīnake bhikkhū,
tika-vin09t:65_9: taṃ “ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametu”nti vuttattā tehi kattabbavidhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:65_11: Na hi te tena kammena kammārahā kammakatā honti.
tika-vin09t:65_14: Na ca tadā saṅgho tesaṃ aṭṭhannampi bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin09t:65_16: Adhikaraṇavūpasamakammassa pattā yuttā saṅghena katāti katvā kammapattā eva hi te honti.
tika-vin09t:65_17: “Te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vacanato tehi kattabbavidhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:65_18: Sammutikaraṇameva kammaṃ hotīti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin09t:65_20: tassa paṭinissaggāya eva te bhikkhū kammārahā kātabbā,
tika-vin09t:65_22: Na hi pācīnakādīnaṃ sammutiyā adhikaraṇavūpasamasiddhi viya tesaṃ samanubhāsanakammena tassa paṭinissaggasiddhi hoti,
tika-vin09t:65_23: sammuti nāmesā paṭhamaṃ anumatiṃ gahetvā yācitvāva karīyati,
tika-vin09t:66_0: “Methunadhamma”nti evaṃ bāhullanayena laddhanāmakaṃ sakapayogena vā parapayogena vā attano nimittassa
tika-vin09t:66_1: sakamagge vā paramagge vā paranimittassa vā sakamagge eva pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin09t:66_4: Keci pana “pavesanādīni cattāri vā tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin09t:66_11: Tesaṃ matena catūsupi catasso pārājikāpattiyo āpajjati.
tika-vin09t:66_15: saṅghādisesāpattiñca āpajjitvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gahaṭṭhakāle methunādikaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā puna
tika-vin09t:66_16: pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā ekaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ ekamanekaṃ vā paṭikaritvāva so puggalo yasmā nirāpattiko hoti,
tika-vin09t:66_19: Vuṭṭhānadesanāhi pana asujjhanato “payoge payoge āpatti pārājikassā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:66_21: atha kho padabhājane “āpatti pārājikassā”ti vacanenāyamattho siddhoti yuttiñca vadanti.
tika-vin09t:67_0: Yadi evaṃ mātikāyampi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin09t:67_4: bhikkhugaṇanañca anavasesetvā tiṭṭhatīti anavasesavacananti katvā paveseva āpatti,
tika-vin09t:67_6: Tamevekaṃ sandhāya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti pārājikāpattimpi anto katvā nidānuddesavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:67_7: Tasmā mātikāyaṃ “pārājika”nti avatvā “pārājiko hotī”ti puggalaniddesavacanaṃ tena sarīrabandhanena upasampadāya abhabbabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t:67_8: “Āpatti pārājikassā”ti padabhājane vacanaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi pārājikassa asaṃvāsassa sato puggalassa atheyyasaṃvāsakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t:67_9: Na hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako hoti,
tika-vin09t:67_11: Tenevāha “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin09t:67_12: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati,
tika-vin09t:67_13: āpatti omasavādena dukkaṭassā”ti anupasampannassa tadabhāvato siddho so upasampanno “bhikkhū”tveva vuccatīti,
tika-vin09t:70_3: vajjiputtakavatthu cāti tippabhedavatthu imassa sikkhāpadassa nidānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:70_11: no ubhatobyañjanake cā”ti makkaṭipārājiko viya aññopi lesaṃ oḍḍetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin09t:70_12: tasmā tādisassa alesokāsassa dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin09t:70_15: Tasmā vibhaṅgo tanniyāmako tassā mātikāya adhippetatthaniyāmako vibhaṅgoti.
tika-vin09t:70_21: tiracchānagatapurisassa dve magge”tiādinā nayena sabbalesokāsaṃ pidahitvā niyamo kato. Etthāha –
tika-vin09t:70_22: yadi evaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadavasena vā liṅgaparivattanavasena vā na kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin09t:70_24: Tadavacanena hi bhikkhunī purisaliṅgapātubhāvena bhikkhubhāve ṭhitā evaṃ vadeyya “nāhaṃ upasampadākaraṇakāle bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā,
tika-vin09t:70_25: tasmā na apaccakkhātasikkhāpi methunadhammena pārājikā homī”ti. Vuccate –
tika-vin09t:70_28: Tathā vutte bhikkhunīnampi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ atthīti āpajjati.
tika-vin09t:70_33: taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampadaṃ tāni vassāni bhikkhūhi saṅgamitu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:70_34: Tato āpattiyā bhedoti tato vibhaṅgato “akkhayite sarīre pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin09t:70_35: yebhuyyena khayite thullaccaya”ntiādi āpattiyā bhedo hoti.
tika-vin09t:70_36: Anāpatti tadaññathāti tato eva vibhaṅgato yena ākārena āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin09t:70_41: anāpattī”ti hi vibhaṅge asati na paññāyati.
tika-vin09t:70_42: Ettāvatā “nidānā mātikābhedo”ti ayaṃ gāthā samāsato vuttatthā hoti.
tika-vin09t:70_43: Visesakāraṇaṃ pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āvibhavissati.
tika-vin09t:71_1: āyasmato sudinnassa aṭṭhavassikakāle paññattattā ca rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle paññattā,
tika-vin09t:71_3: So hi āyasmā makkaṭipārājiko yathā mātugāmappaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu tiracchānagatitthī na adhippetā,
tika-vin09t:71_7: Tatiyapaññatti lābhaggamahattaṃ pattakāle uppannā “yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā”tiādi vacanato,
tika-vin09t:71_8: vepullamahattampi ettheva labbhatīti imaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ tividhampi vatthuṃ upādāya catubbidhampi taṃ kālaṃ patvā paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:72_4: yā bhagavatā yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannabhikkhūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena sikkhitabbā sikkhā vihitā,
tika-vin09t:72_5: “ettha saha jīvantī”ti yo ca sājīvo vutto,
tika-vin09t:72_8: Yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannasamanantarameva tadubhayaṃ jānantopi ajānantopi tadajjhupagatattā samāpannova nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t:72_9: Saha jīvantīti yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin09t:72_11: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhāsamāpanno sājīvaṃ avītikkamanto sājīvasamāpanno”ti,
tika-vin09t:72_14: kāmavitakkādibahulo vā ekaccaṃ sāvasesaṃ sājīvaṃ vītikkamanto vā sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno nāma na hoti.
tika-vin09t:73_1: “atthi bhikkhu sikkhāsamāpanno sīlāni paccavekkhanto na sājīvasamāpanno acittakaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamanto,
tika-vin09t:73_2: atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno kāmavitakkādibahulo sājīvasamāpanno nirāpattiko,
tika-vin09t:73_3: atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno na ca sājīvasamāpanno anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin09t:73_4: atthi ubhayasamāpanno sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto”ti.
tika-vin09t:73_5: Ayamettha catuttho bhikkhu ukkaṭṭho idha adhippeto siyā.
tika-vin09t:73_6: Na hi bhagavā anukkaṭṭhaṃ vattuṃ yuttoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:73_8: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vacanavirodhato,
tika-vin09t:73_9: ukkaṭṭhaggahaṇādhippāye sati “sikkhāti tisso sikkhā”ti ettakameva vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:73_11: “Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti parato vacanaṃ apekkhitvā adhisīlasikkhāva vuttāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:73_21: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:73_22: Tasmā adhisīlasikkhāya saṅgāhako sājīvo sikkhāsājīvoti vutto.
tika-vin09t:73_27: Tañca upasampadūpagamanantarato paṭṭhāya sikkhanādhikārattā “sikkhatī”ti ca “samāpanno”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin09t:73_29: tādisaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca aparabhāge sājīvasaṅkhātameva sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya tasmiṃyeva dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā
tika-vin09t:74_3: Sabbesu sikkhāpadesu idameva bhikkhulakkhaṇaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ yadidaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti.
tika-vin09t:74_7: tasmā sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ sāmaññamidaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇanti katvā kevalaṃ sikkhāsamāpanno,
tika-vin09t:74_12: tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha sikkhāsaddassa avacane parihāraṃ vatvā yasmā pana so sikkhampi samāpanno,
tika-vin09t:74_13: tasmā sikkhāsamāpannotipi atthato veditabboti ca vatvā “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno,
tika-vin09t:74_16: tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuttanti ayamaṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:74_17: Etasmiṃ pana adhippāye adhisīlasikkhāya eva gahaṇaṃ sabbatthikattā,
tika-vin09t:74_19: Yathā ca sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyanto sīlaṃ samādiyatīti vuccati,
tika-vin09t:74_20: evaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paccakkhanto sīlaṃ paccakkhātīti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin09t:74_23: Ettāvatā samāsato “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha vattabbavinicchayo niṭṭhito hoti.
tika-vin09t:75_1: nanu “yo pana bhikkhu sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā…pe…
tika-vin09t:75_7: sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya ca methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa pārājikāpatti.
tika-vin09t:75_8: Yo vā pacchā pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, tassa ca,
tika-vin09t:75_9: yo vā pakkhapaṇḍakattā paṇḍakabhāvūpagamanena na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t:75_11: Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ca paṇḍako upasampadāya na vatthū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:75_13: Tasmiṃ pakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe paṇḍakattā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t:75_14: so pariccajitabbāya sikkhāya abhāvena sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya mukhena parassa aṅgajātaggahaṇanayena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin09t:75_16: Ayaṃ nayo apaṇḍakapakkhaṃ alabhamānasseva parato yujjati,
tika-vin09t:75_17: labhantassa pana arūpasattānaṃ kusalādisamāpattikkhaṇe bhavaṅgavicchede satipi amaraṇaṃ viya paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi bhikkhubhāvo atthi.
tika-vin09t:75_18: Saṃvāsaṃ vā sādiyantassa na theyyasaṃvāsakabhāvo atthi antimavatthuajjhāpannassa viya.
tika-vin09t:75_20: Gaṇapūrako pana na hoti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno viya.
tika-vin09t:75_27: Yato upasampadā tassa apaṇḍakapakkhe anuññātā sahetukappaṭisandhikattā.
tika-vin09t:76_0: Apica “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti iminā tassa sikkhāsamādānaṃ dīpetvā taṃ samādinnaṃ sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya,
tika-vin09t:76_1: tattha ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin09t:76_2: na aññathāti iminā kāraṇena yathāvuttāniṭṭhappasaṅgato “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:76_4: evaṃ “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t:76_5: yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin09t:77_4: Ayaṃ tāva mātikāya vinicchayo aññatthāpi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā dīpetabbo.
tika-vin09t:78_0: Sāriputtabelaṭṭhasīsānandādayopi sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā ca āpattiāpajjanato ca kasmā mahāvibhaṅge ñatticatutthaupasampadāyeva āgatāti?
tika-vin09t:78_2: Āpattiyā bhabbataṃ sandhāya tasmimpi vutte pubbe paṭikkhittāpi bhagavatā puna anuññātāti bhikkhūnaṃ micchāgāho vā vimati vā uppajjati,
tika-vin09t:79_5: Yadi evaṃ “ṭhānārahenā”ti idameva vattabbaṃ iminā akuppasiddhitoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:79_6: aṭṭhānārahena akuppena upasampanno imasmiṃ atthe na adhippeto aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t:79_7: Dvīhi panetehi ekato vuttehi ayamattho paññāyati –
tika-vin09t:79_8: kevalaṃ tena akuppena upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti,
tika-vin09t:79_9: ṭhānārahena ca akuppena ca upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti,
tika-vin09t:80_0: “Paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya aparipuṇṇavīsativasso”ti vuttattā opapātikañcāti soḷasavassuddesikā opapātikā
tika-vin09t:80_2: ‘Soḷasavassuddesikā hontī’ti vuttattā puna cattāri vassāni icchitabbāni,
tika-vin09t:80_3: ‘paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyā’ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena vutta”nti eke.
tika-vin09t:80_5: tattha tattha vicāretvā atthaṃ suṭṭhu upalakkhaye.
tika-vin09t:82_0: Rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ “gihī maṃ ‘samaṇo’ti jānantū”ti vañcanacitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin09t:82_1: ca tehi saṃvasitukāmatāya ca abhāvā doso na jātoti.
tika-vin09t:82_3: so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti vā “evaṃ kātuṃ na labbhatī”ti vā “evaṃ pabbajito sāmaṇero na hotī”ti vā na jānāti, vaṭṭati. “Jānāti,
tika-vin09t:82_5: “Rājadubbhikkhādiatthāya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā saṃvāsaṃ sādiyanto theyyasaṃvāsako hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t:82_8: kiṃ etenāti vippaṭisārena vā paccayādisulabhatāya vā karissāmī’ti suddhamānaso hutvā yāva so saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin09t:82_10: Evaṃ suddhacittuppattito paṭṭhāya saṃvāsaṃ sādiyati ce,
tika-vin09t:83_0: “Nābhiparāmāsādinā jāto tathārūpaṃ pitaraṃ ghāteti ce, pitughātako hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:84_2: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ekatoupasampannaṃ dūsetvāpi bhikkhunidūsako hoti,
tika-vin09t:85_0: “Sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ mariyādaṃ avītikkamanto tasmiñca sikkhāpade sikkhatīti vuccati.
tika-vin09t:85_9: Yasmā sikkhāya guṇasammatāya puññasammatāya tantiyā abhāvato lokassa dubbalyāvikammaṃ tattha na sambhavati.
tika-vin09t:85_14: Dubbalyāvikammapadaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānapadassa byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya vā parivārakabhāvena vā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:85_15: Atha vā yasmā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ akataṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:85_16: tasmā taṃ sandhāya “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivaranto “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti āha.
tika-vin09t:85_17: Tattha siyā yasmā na sabbaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t:85_18: tasmā “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā tassa atthaniyamatthaṃ “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti vattabbanti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
tika-vin09t:85_23: tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuccamāne anukkameneva attho vutto hoti,
tika-vin09t:87_0: Pavesanaṃ nāma aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa aṅgajātena samphusanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:87_1: Paviṭṭhaṃ nāma yāva mūlaṃ pavesentassa vippakatakālo vāyāmakālo.
tika-vin09t:87_4: Vinayagaṇṭhipade pana “vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:88_0: Ubhatovibhaṅge eva paññattāni sandhāya “idañhi sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ nidāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:88_1: “Vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā”ti vuttattā idha tatiyā sahayogena vuttā.
tika-vin09t:88_8: “Kathaṃ vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā”ti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:88_9: nanu ayaṃ “parisato vā”ti vacanena saṅgahitoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:88_10: “dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjantī”ti suttassa hi vibhaṅge tassa anāmaṭṭhattāti ayamattho
tika-vin09t:88_11: yasmā tattha tattha sarūpena vuttapāḷivaseneva sakkā jānituṃ,
tika-vin09t:88_13: “Aṅga”nti padaṃ uddharitvā “sabbasikkhāpadesu āpattīnaṃ aṅgānaṅgaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:88_15: Samuṭṭhanādīnaṃ parivārādīsu saṅkhepena āgatattā tattha gahetvā idhāpi niddiṭṭhānaṃ anaṅgānaṃ vavatthānābhāvato,
tika-vin09t:88_16: sabbattha saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca anaṅgatte vuccamāne ativitthāratāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade anūnaṃ vattabbato cāti veditabbo,
tika-vin09t:89_1: tesaṃ vasena kāyavācā saha viññattiyā veditabbā,
tika-vin09t:89_6: Aviññattijanakampi ekaccaṃ bāhullanayena “kiriya”nti vuccati yatheva paṭhamapārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t:89_11: viññattisaṅkhātāpi kiriyā vinā sevanacittena na hoti vuttacittajattā,
tika-vin09t:89_15: itaraṃ cittajarūpaṃ viya janakacittena vinā na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t:89_17: tasmā kiriyāya sati ekantato tajjanakaṃ sevanacittaṃ atthi evāti katvā na sādiyati,
tika-vin09t:89_19: Yasmā viññattijanakampi samānaṃ sevanacittaṃ na sabbakālaṃ viññattiṃ janeti,
tika-vin09t:89_20: tasmā vināpi viññattiyā sayaṃ uppajjatīti katvā “sādiyati,
tika-vin09t:89_25: Teneva bhagavā “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti citteneva āpattiṃ paricchindati,
tika-vin09t:90_0: Ettha samuṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ kattabbato vā akattabbato vā kāyādibhedāpekkhameva āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin09t:90_4: Tena yaṃ cittaṃ kiriyalakkhaṇe vā akiriyalakkhaṇe vā sannihitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:90_5: yato vā kiriyā vā akiriyā vā hoti,
tika-vin09t:90_6: na taṃ avisesena āpattiyā aṅgaṃ vā anaṅgaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin09t:90_10: Idāni yena cittena sikkhāpadaṃ sacittakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:90_16: tasmā manokammampi siyā āpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇappayojanaṃ kammaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t:91_3: taṃ ekaccaṃ avedanampi nirodhaṃ samāpanno āpajjatīti vedanāttikaṃ ettha na labbhatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ vedanāttikaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t:91_4: Sikkhāpadañhi sacittakapuggalavasena “ticittaṃ tivedana”nti laddhavohāraṃ acittakenāpannampi “ticittaṃ tivedana”miceva vuccati.
tika-vin09t:92_4: Surāpānasmiñhi “surā”ti vā “pātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalamevāti.
tika-vin09t:92_5: Tattha “na vaṭṭatīti jānitvā”ti vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassapi lokavajjatāpasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t:92_6: Imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ pariharitukāmatāya ca vajirabuddhittherena likhitaṃ –
tika-vin09t:92_7: “idha ‘sacittaka’nti ca ‘acittaka’nti ca vicāraṇā vatthuvijānane eva hoti,
tika-vin09t:92_12: Tasmā vatthuvijānane eva hotīti idaṃ yujjati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t:92_15: Ayaṃ panettha attho sikkhāpadasīsena āpattiṃ gahetvā yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t:92_17: sacittakācittakasaṅkhātassa acittakassa ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t:92_18: tampi surāpānādilokavajjanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t:92_21: Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakāya “sacittakapakkhe”ti visesane payojanaṃ atthīti,
tika-vin09t:92_22: evaṃ santepi aniyamena vuttañca niyamavasena eva gahetabbanti attho.
tika-vin09t:93_2: Kiriyāti ettha “ṭhitaṃ sādiyatī”ti vuttattā taṃ kathanti ce?
tika-vin09t:93_4: Evaṃ sante “kāyakammaṃ manokamma”nti vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:93_10: padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hotī”ti vadantenāpi atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthameva padabyañjanassa sunikkhittabhāvo icchito,
tika-vin09t:96_0: Gāmā vā araññā vāti lakkhaṇānupaññattikattā ādimhi vuttā.
tika-vin09t:96_10: Tattha atthi gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci labhati,
tika-vin09t:96_12: tathā atthi araññaṃ na araññaparihāraṃ katthaci labhati,
tika-vin09t:96_13: atthi araññaṃ na araññakiccaṃ karotīti ayampi bhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:97_0: Tattha avippavāsasīmāsammannanakammavācāya ṭhapetvā “gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha gāmo nāma parikkhitto ce,
tika-vin09t:97_7: Tathā antaragharappaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ sekhiyānaṃ ayameva paricchedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:97_8: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyyā”ti etthāpi ayameva paricchedo adhippeto “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantiyā,
tika-vin09t:98_1: taṃ vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadesu āciṇṇaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā pamādena likhīyati,
tika-vin09t:98_3: Yesu ca potthakesu vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadassa vibhaṅge “gāmaṃ paviseyyāti parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa,
tika-vin09t:98_7: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t:99_0: Yaṃ pana katthaci potthake “bhikkhuniyā gāmantarādhikāre ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ vā atikkamante,
tika-vin09t:99_7: Katthaci potthake “okkantamatte cā”ti padaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin09t:99_17: ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkante thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin09t:100_0: Gaṇṭhipade cassa “parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti vatvā “upacārepi eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:100_1: Anugaṇṭhipade ca “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ ‘okkamantiyā’tipi potthakesu ekaccesu dissati,
tika-vin09t:100_3: Aparampi vuttaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ ‘atikkāmentiyā’ti vacanenāpi evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin09t:100_4: vikāle gāmappavesane dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ eva vasena upacāro paricchinditabbo,
tika-vin09t:100_5: itarathā yathā ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhepaṃ viya katvā ‘atikkāmentiyā’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:100_6: evaṃ tatthāpi ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentassā’ti vadeyya.
tika-vin09t:100_7: Yasmā pana tattha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato uttarimeko leḍḍupāto upacāroti adhippeto.
tika-vin09t:100_8: Tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassā’ti vutta”nti.
tika-vin09t:101_0: Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃyeva upacāranti sallakkhetvā “parikkhepapaakkhepārahaṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-vin09t:101_2: pāḷivisesamasallakkhetvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa idha upacāro parikkhepo yathā bhaveyya,
tika-vin09t:101_3: taṃ upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin09t:101_4: dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:101_9: Ettāvatā imesu yathāvuttesu ṭhānesu yathāvuttaparicchedova gāmoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:101_10: Imassa atthassa dīpanatthaṃ “gāmo nāma ekakuṭikopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:101_12: upacārokkamane vā antarārāmato vā bhikkhunupassayato vā titthiyaseyyato vā paṭikkamanato vā taṃ gāmaṃ pavisantassa antarārāmaparikkhepassa,
tika-vin09t:101_13: upacārassa vā atikkamanavasena gāmapaccayā āpattiyo veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:102_0: Gāmūpacāro pana “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepova,
tika-vin09t:102_4: Tesu adhiṭṭhitatecīvariko bhikkhu parihāraṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t:102_9: Aṭṭhuppattito “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ‘bhagavatā ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti anuññātā’ti antaraghare
tika-vin09t:102_10: cīvarāni nikkhipantī”ti imissā hi aṭṭhuppattiyā “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:102_13: Tena ca udositasikkhāpade “antogāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antogāme vatthabba”nti ca “sabhāye vā dvāramūle vā,
tika-vin09t:102_14: hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:102_15: Kappiyabhūmiyaṃ vasantoyeva hi kappiyabhūmiyaṃ nikkhittacīvaraṃ rakkhati.
tika-vin09t:102_16: Sāsaṅkasikkhāpade pana “yasmā yattha gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin09t:102_17: tena gāmena vippavasanto cīvarena vippavasatīti vuccati,
tika-vin09t:102_18: tasmā puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:102_19: Tasmiñhi sikkhāpade gāmasīmā gāmo nāmāti adhippeto.
tika-vin09t:102_20: Tattha vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadavibhaṅge “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato parikkhepo na gāmo.
tika-vin09t:102_22: Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti ārabhitvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa
tika-vin09t:102_23: majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti iminā aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāso gāmūpacāroti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:102_24: Tadatthasambhavato tasmiṃ gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-vin09t:102_29: aparikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepokāso”ti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:102_32: Tathā pāḷiyampi “ajjhārāmo nāma parikkhittassa ārāmassa anto ārāmo,
tika-vin09t:102_34: Ajjhāvasatho nāma parikkhittassa āvasathassa anto āvasatho,
tika-vin09t:103_0: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti pāḷivisesasambhavato ca paṭhamo leḍḍupāto gāmo eva,
tika-vin09t:103_2: Parikkhittassa pana gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti vuttanti ettha bhedo natthi.
tika-vin09t:104_0: Gāmakhettassa ca gāmasīmāya ca lakkhaṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:105_0: Gāmasīmūpacāro nāma manussānaṃ kaṭṭhatiṇapupphaphalādiatthikānaṃ vanacarakānaṃ valañjanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:105_2: “agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā”ti āgataṭṭhāne khandhake ca veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:105_3: Ettha hi bhagavā gāmantavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīmaṃ dassento “yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharatī”ti vatvā dasseti.
tika-vin09t:105_5: Tasmā yo bhikkhu gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya na viharati,
tika-vin09t:105_6: kevalaṃ nāvāyaṃ vā thalamaggena vā addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti,
tika-vin09t:105_7: tassa tattha tattha sattabbhantarasīmā labbhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:105_9: satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabba”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t:105_10: Idameva araññaṃ sandhāya “āraññakasīmāya ekaṃ agāmakaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:106_0: Yaṃ sandhāya “agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:106_1: Idaṃ saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:107_2: Yaṃ sandhāya gaṇamhā ohīyanādhikāre aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “agāmake araññeti ettha ‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā
tika-vin09t:107_3: sabbametaṃ arañña’nti evaṃ vuttaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ araññaṃ.
tika-vin09t:107_6: Yaṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:107_7: Idaṃ āraññakasenāsanaṃ nāma parikkhittassa parikkhepato bahi,
tika-vin09t:107_8: aparikkhittassa pana parikkhepokāsato bahi sarukkhaṃ vā arukkhaṃ vā vihāre kunnadisamākiṇṇampi araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:107_11: Idaṃ pana pubbe agāmakabhāvena āgataṭṭhāne vuttalakkhaṇameva hutvā nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā dassanūpacāravijahane ekameva āpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:107_13: “Saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ eka”nti vuttaṃ pana addhayojane addhayojane ekekaṃ āpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:107_15: Itarāni tīṇi yathāvuttaparicchedato orameva tattha vuttavidhiṃ na sampādenti,
tika-vin09t:108_0: Tattha pañcavidhe gāme yo “parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto”ti vutto,
tika-vin09t:108_1: so na katthaci vinayapiṭake upayogaṃ gato,
tika-vin09t:108_2: kevalaṃ aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāsato aparo eko leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro nāmāti dīpanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin09t:108_3: Parikkhittassapi ce gāmassa eko leḍḍupāto kappiyabhūmisamāno upacāroti vutto,
tika-vin09t:108_5: So pana pākaṭattā ca ajjhokāsattā ca okkamantassa āpattiṃ karoti ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpattiṃ.
tika-vin09t:108_6: Bhikkhuniyo hi tasmiṃ dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāte gāmūpacāre vasantī āpattiñca āpajjanti,
tika-vin09t:108_8: Tāsañhi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ araññasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati “tāvadeva chāyā metabbā…pe…
tika-vin09t:108_13: kappiyabhūmibhāvavacanato ca “ekā gaṇamhā ohīyeyyāti agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ
tika-vin09t:108_14: vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādisikkhāpadapaññattito ca bhikkhunikkhandhakanayaena
tika-vin09t:108_15: vā yasmā parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato paṭṭhāya aparikkhittassa upacārato paṭṭhāya nīyati,
tika-vin09t:108_16: tattha antaraghare nikkhittacīvare sati caturaṅgasamodhānena bhikkhū vasanti,
tika-vin09t:109_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato bhikkhunīnaṃ araññavāso nāma natthīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:109_5: Tāya hi araññe bhikkhunupassaye sati antoāvāsepi dutiyikāya dassanasavanūpacāraṃ vijahantiyā āpatti.
tika-vin09t:109_6: Tasmā avippavāsasīmādhikāre “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:110_0: Tāsañca avippavāsasīmākammavācāyaṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vacanaṃ natthīti katvā tesveva gāmagāmūpacāresu pharati.
tika-vin09t:110_1: Tato paraṃ dutiyesu leḍḍupātādīsu tāsaṃ akappiyabhūmikattā na samānasaṃvāsakasīmā araññe pharati bhikkhūnaṃ gāmagāmūpacāraṃ viya.
tika-vin09t:111_1: araññabhedañca ñatvā idāni “atthi gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci labhatī”tiādibhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:111_2: Tattha yo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “amanusso nāma yo sabbaso vā manussānaṃ abhāvena yakkhapariggahabhūto”ti vutto,
tika-vin09t:111_3: so gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci sikkhāpade labhati.
tika-vin09t:111_8: kevalaṃ bhayena vā chaḍḍito sagharova antarahitagāmabhūto,
tika-vin09t:111_9: so “gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttapācittiyaṃ janeti,
tika-vin09t:111_12: Yo pana gāmo yato vā manussā kenacideva karaṇīyena punapi āgantukāmā eva apakkantāti vutto,
tika-vin09t:112_0: Atthi araññaṃ na araññaparihāraṃ katthaci labhatīti ettha “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāma agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā ekūpacāro,
tika-vin09t:112_1: tato paraṃ nānūpacāro”ti ettha yvāyaṃ nānūpacāroti vutto,
tika-vin09t:112_3: Yo pana parikkhittassa ekaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāto gāmūpacāranāmako gāmo,
tika-vin09t:112_5: so atthi gāmo na gāmakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t:112_6: Na hi taṃ ṭhānaṃ okkamanto gāmappavesanāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin09t:112_7: Yaṃ pana gāmasīmāya pariyāpannaṃ manussānaṃ valañjanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ araññaṃ,
tika-vin09t:112_8: taṃ atthi araññaṃ na araññakiccaṃ karoti nāma.
tika-vin09t:112_10: Ettāvatā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti imissā anupaññattiyā lakkhaṇānupaññattibhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-vin09t:113_0: “Gonisādiniviṭṭhopi gāmo”ti ettha sace tassa gāmassa gāmakhettaparicchedo atthi,
tika-vin09t:113_3: Sace gāmakhette sati kānici tāni gharāni aññamaññaupacārappahonakaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā dūre dūre katāni honti,
tika-vin09t:113_6: bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpattīsu ca gharānaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t:113_8: āraññakasenāsanassa āsannagharassa dutiyaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya pañcadhanusatantaratā pamāṇanti evaṃ no paṭibhānanti ācariyā.
tika-vin09t:114_0: “Yampi ekasmiṃyeva gāmakhette ekaṃ padesaṃ ‘ayampi visuṃgāmo hotū’ti paricchinditvā rājā kassaci deti,
tika-vin09t:114_1: sopi visuṃgāmasīmā hotiyevā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato taṃ pavisantiyā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpatti hoti eva.
tika-vin09t:114_2: Sace tattha vihāro vā devakulaṃ vā sabhā vā gehaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin09t:114_6: Tañca ṭhānaṃ itarassa gāmassa parikkhepabbhantare vā upacārabbhantare vā hoti,
tika-vin09t:114_7: vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ. No ce,
tika-vin09t:114_9: Tattha ce ārāmo vā titthiyaseyyādīsu aññatarovā hoti,
tika-vin09t:114_12: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantiyā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpatti pariharitabbā.
tika-vin09t:114_13: “Araññaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti ettha parikkhepe sati yathāvuttaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin09t:114_16: parikkhepe asati yathāvuttaparicchedaṃ gāmūpacārameva ṭhapetvā tato paraṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:114_17: Evaṃ sati “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttalakkhaṇe agāmake araññe gaṇamhāohīyanāpatti,
tika-vin09t:114_18: tattha avippavāsasīmāya pharaṇaṃ vikāle gāmappavesanāpattiyā anāpattīti evamādivinayavidhi sameti,
tika-vin09t:115_0: “Ṭhapetvā gāmūpacāraṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti vutte gāmūpacārato paro araññanti siddhe “ṭhapetvā gāma”nti visesattho na dissati,
tika-vin09t:115_1: gāmassa pana araññabhāvappasaṅgabhayā vuttanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:115_7: parova gāmoti katvā na yuttaṃ gāmassa araññabhāvappasaṅgato ca.
tika-vin09t:115_8: Tasmā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ettha gāmūpacāropi “gāmo” tveva saṅgahito.
tika-vin09t:115_10: Yadi evaṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmaṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti ettakaṃ vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:115_12: Tathā hi vutto “araññaparicchedo na paññāyatī”ti no laddhi.
tika-vin09t:115_14: Yadi evaṃ “gāmassa ca araññassa ca paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:115_15: “araññassa paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti kimatthaṃ vuttanti ce? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t:115_17: hi bāhiraindakhīlato paṭṭhāya gāmūpacāraṃ araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:115_18: Gāmaparicchedavacane payojanaṃ panettha natthi parikkhepeneva pākaṭabhūtattā.
tika-vin09t:115_19: Dutiyagāmūpacārova gāmassa paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutto parikkhepabhāvena apākaṭattā.
tika-vin09t:115_23: Evaṃ sante subyattataraṃ araññaparicchedo dassito hoti,
tika-vin09t:116_0: “Majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti hi vutte ayaṃ gāmūpacārova araññaṃ gāmūpacārassa vibhaṅgattā.
tika-vin09t:116_3: araññato paranti ca micchāgāho hotīti ce,
tika-vin09t:116_4: nanu vuttaṃ “paṭhamameva idaṃ parikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraniyamanatthaṃ vutta”nti?
tika-vin09t:116_6: indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātoti pana evaṃ vacanappayojanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:116_7: Aparikkhittassa ca gāmassa yvāyaṃ leḍḍupāto upacāro”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto,
tika-vin09t:116_10: “Araññaṃ nāmā”ti padaṃ anuddharitvā “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti uddharaṇassa katattā.
tika-vin09t:116_11: Tattha “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti mātikāyaṃ avijjamānaṃ padaṃ uddharanto tayo atthavase dasseti.
tika-vin09t:116_15: na kevalaṃ aparikkhittassayeva upacāro vinayādhikāre sappayojano dassitabbo,
tika-vin09t:116_16: nippayojanopi parikkhittassa upacāro iminā pariyāyena labbhatīti anusaṅgappayojanameko atthopi veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:117_0: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti idaṃ bhagavā tayo atthavase paṭicca abhāsi.
tika-vin09t:117_4: tattha ṭhitassa dutiyo leḍḍupāto sabbattha gāmappaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu sakiccako upacāroti dassanamekoti
tika-vin09t:117_5: evaṃ bhagavā attano desanāvilāsappattiyā ekekapaduddhāraṇena tayo atthavase dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:118_0: Tathā avippavāsasīmākammavācāya “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti etthāpi parikkhepe sati gāmaṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin09t:118_3: aparikkhittassa ca majjhe ārāme avippavāsasīmāsammannanakāle ayaṃ nayo ativiya yujjati.
tika-vin09t:118_4: Ubhayaparivajjanato pubbe vuttanayena vā ubhayattha ubhayaṃ labbhateva.
tika-vin09t:118_5: “Antarārāmesu pana āciṇṇakappā bhikkhū avippavāsasīmaṃ sammannantī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:118_6: “Antaragharappaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ sekhiyānaṃ antarārāmesu asambhavato antarārāmo na gāmasaṅkhaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t:118_8: Te bhikkhū dutiyassa gāmūpacārassa gāmasaṅkhāsabhāvato tāsaṃ imāya dutiyāya avippavāsakammavācāya abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-vin09t:118_9: Ajjhārāmo pana gāmopi samāno titthiyaseyyādi viya kappiyabhūmīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:125_2: agilānenapi ārāme ārāmūpacāre chattaṃ dhāretu”nti evamādīsu bāhire upacāre dissati.
tika-vin09t:125_8: aparikkhittassa upacāro”tiādīsu pana upacārasaddo abbhantare upacāre dissati.
tika-vin09t:125_15: Tesu bāhirabbhantarabhedabhinnesu dvīsu upacāresu avippavāsasīmādhikāre “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti
tika-vin09t:125_19: tassā gāmantarāpattiyā ṭhānabhūtattā ca abbhantaraupacārassāti idamettha kāraṇadvayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:125_20: Tattha idha adinnādānapārājikavibhaṅgeyeva paṭhamo gāmūpacāro dassito,
tika-vin09t:125_23: Paṭhamena ca aparikkhittassa gāmassa dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāto bāhiro upacāro,
tika-vin09t:125_24: dutiyena ca parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepato bāhirasaṅkhāto abbhantaro upacāro lesena dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:125_25: Evaṃ cattāropi upacārā idha bhagavatā desanāvilāsappattena desanālīlāya dassitā hontīti ayaṃ nayo suṭṭhu
tika-vin09t:125_26: lakkhetvā ācariyehi sammantayitvā yathānurūpaṃ tattha yojetabbo.
tika-vin09t:138_1: gāmasaṅkhāto upacāro gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti uddharitvā gāmassa upacāraṃ dassento “indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa
tika-vin09t:138_2: purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti vatvā puna gāmasaṅkhātaṃ upacāraṃ dassento “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin09t:138_4: Imamatthaṃ sandhāya vikāle gāmappavesanagāmantaraaappavāsasammutiādīsu parikkhepārahaṭṭhānameva gāmūpacāranti vuttanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:139_0: Atthato ekanti ettha saṅkhāsaddaṃ saṅkhātasaddena samānayati.
tika-vin09t:139_2: Ṭhānācāvanavasena ca khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena cāti attho.
tika-vin09t:139_3: Ṭhānācāvane yathā sāmikassa dhuranikkhepādiṃ anoloketvāva āpatti,
tika-vin09t:140_0: “Asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmī”ti sabbesaṃ ekāsayattā “ekenāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:141_2: Idāni suddhacittena gahitepi hoti evāti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:141_4: Ettha pana vinicchayo samantapāsādikaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t:143_3: saddena pātane na rakkhatīti atthe siddhepi atthasādhakavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ uddharitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:144_4: Rājānoti kiñci aniddisitvā sādhāraṇavasena kiñcāpi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:145_0: Pubbappayogeti ettha gamanakāle maggasodhanādhikaraṇe apācittiyakhette dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t:145_2: Gantvā pana kumbhimatthake jātalatādicchedane sahapayogattā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t:145_5: ahampi ekapassaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti saṃvidahitvā ubhayesaṃ payogena ṭhānācāvane kate kāyavācācittehi samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t:145_6: Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin09t:145_7: āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassāti vuttalakkhaṇena virujjhatī”ti vinayagaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Pi-
tika-vin09t:147_0: Tatra vācaṅgaṃ cittaṃva, kammaṃ nassā vidhīyati.
tika-vin09t:149_0: Na yuttaṃ taṃ viruddhattā, kammamekaṃva yujjatīti. ;
tika-vin09t:152_2: tīraṇapariññā pana dhammasabhāvena saddhiṃ aniccādivasena pavattamānaṃ “rūpaṃ aniccanti vā”tiādi,
tika-vin09t:152_3: evamidha saddhiṃ cetetvā ekattenāpi pāṇātipātābhāvā “jīvitā voropeyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:152_4: “Manussaviggaha”nti vuttattā gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena sabbasukhumaattabhāvato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “kalalato paṭṭhāyā”ti āha.
tika-vin09t:152_7: santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā sakkā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t:152_8: Tasmiñhi upakkame kate laddhūpakkamaṃ jīvitadasakaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ dubbalassa parihīnavegassa paccayo hoti.
tika-vin09t:152_9: Santatipaccuppannaṃ yathā dve tayo javanavāre javitvā nirujjhati,
tika-vin09t:152_12: Tato santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ apatvā antarāva nirujjhati.
tika-vin09t:153_0: “Imassa panatthassā”ti vohāravasena vuttamatthaṃ paramatthavasena āvibhāvatthaṃ “pāṇo veditabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:153_1: Kāyaviññattisahitāya cetanāya payujjatīti payogo, ko so?
tika-vin09t:153_2: Sarīre satthādīnaṃ gamanaṃ paharaṇanti kāyavacīviññattisahitāya cetanāya parasarīre satthapātanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:153_7: Yo koci maratūti ettha mahājanasamūhe na sakkā.
tika-vin09t:153_14: Etesu hi avirajjhitesu eva āṇattipayogo hoti,
tika-vin09t:156_0: Duṭṭhacitto sace yāti, hoti so itthimārako.
tika-vin09t:157_0: Bhikkhatthāya sace yāti, jānantopi na mārako;
tika-vin09t:158_0: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako.
tika-vin09t:159_0: Viyogena ca me jāyā, jananī ca na jīvati;
tika-vin09t:160_0: Iti jānaṃ viyuñjanto, tadatthiko hoti mārako.
tika-vin09t:162_0: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako.
tika-vin09t:163_0: Hārakasaddassa bhedato atthaṃ vitthāretvā ubhayampi ekamevāti dassetuṃ “satthañca taṃ hārakañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:163_2: “Iti cittamano”ti uddharitvāpi itisaddassa attho na tāva vutto.
tika-vin09t:163_4: adhikāravasena pana āgataṃ itisaddaṃ yojetvā iti cittasaṅkappoti ettha “maraṇasaññī maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti
tika-vin09t:163_7: Sāhatthikanissaggiyappayogesu sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya sattamāya saha uppannakāyaviññattiyā sāhatthikatā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:163_8: Āṇattike pana sattahipi cetanāhi saha vacīviññattisambhavato satta satta saddā ekato hutvā ekekakkharabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t:163_9: gantvā yattakehi akkharehi attano adhippāyaṃ viññāpenti,
tika-vin09t:166_3: Kevalaṃ “pāpicchatāyā”ti vacanato mandattā momūhattā samudācarantassa anāpattīti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:166_6: so bhikkhu arahā”tiādīsu viya sikkhāpadepi “iti jānāmī”ti paccuppannameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:168_2: lambīādayo ca cattāro paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:168_4: Mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idhānupasampannā eva adhippetā,
tika-vin09t:168_6: yasmā pana ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ paṭisevino honti,
tika-vin09t:168_8: Na labhati bhikkhūhīti ettha “uposathādibhedaṃ saṃvāsa”nti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:168_10: Pāḷiyaṃ “saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:168_11: Tividhenāpi saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti paṭikkhittaṃ. “Na,
tika-vin09t:168_13: gahaṭṭhena nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādi pātimokkhappavāraṇāsu eva āgataṃ,
tika-vin09t:168_14: aññesu ca evarūpesu ṭhānesu sesaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ natthi paṭikkhepo.
tika-vin09t:168_18: saṅghādisesena codentassa pācittiyanti bhikkhuno viya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:168_21: tassa paṭiggahaṇañca bhikkhussa vaṭṭatīti ācariyā vadantī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:168_22: “Yathā pure tathā pacchāti ‘ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā’ti evaṃ vuttasaṃvāsassa abhabbatāmattaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:169_1: methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto atthi koci pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso,
tika-vin09t:169_2: atthi koci na pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso,
tika-vin09t:169_3: atthi koci na pārājiko saṃvāso dukkaṭavatthusmiṃ vā thullaccayavatthusmiṃ vā paṭisevanto,
tika-vin09t:169_4: atthi koci na pārājiko pakkhapaṇḍako apaṇḍakapakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakapakkhe methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto.
tika-vin09t:169_5: So āpattiṃ nāpajjatīti na pārājiko nāma.
tika-vin09t:169_6: Na hi abhikkhussa āpatti nāma atthi.
tika-vin09t:169_7: So anāpattikattā apaṇḍakapakkhe āgato kiṃ asaṃvāso hoti,
tika-vin09t:169_11: asaṃvāso”ti vuttattā yo bhikkhubhāvena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-vin09t:169_14: “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vuttaṭṭhāne yathā abhikkhunā kammavācāya sāvitāyapi kammaṃ ruhati kammavipattiyā asambhavato,
tika-vin09t:169_18: saṅgho ca tasmiṃ upasampannasaññī eva ce,
tika-vin09t:170_0: Gahaṭṭho vā titthiyo vā paṇḍako vā kammavācaṃ sāveti,
tika-vin09t:170_3: upasampanno saṅghenā”ti hi vacanato saṅghena kammavācāya vattabbatāya saṅghapariyāpannena,
tika-vin09t:170_4: saṅghapariyāpannasaññitena vā ekena vuttāya saṅghena vuttā hotīti veditabbo,
tika-vin09t:171_0: Tathā atthi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto koci nāsetabbo,
tika-vin09t:171_2: ayaṃ nāsetabbo”ti vuttattā tena eva so anupasampannova sahaseyyāpattiṃ vā aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ janeti,
tika-vin09t:171_10: kevalaṃ asaṃvāsoti katvā gaṇapūrako na hoti.
tika-vin09t:171_12: samasikkhatāpi saṃvāsoti katvā so tena saddhiṃ natthīti.
tika-vin09t:171_14: Yathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ekakammādino saṃvāsassa abhāvā bhikkhunī asaṃvāsā bhikkhussa,
tika-vin09t:171_17: Tathā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannopi ekecco “yo nāsetabboti vutto”ti iminā nidassanena sakāraṇacchāyā ajjhupekkhitā hotīti na gahaṇaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t:171_20: “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti vacanato ca yo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā anuvijjakena anuvijjiyamāno parājito,
tika-vin09t:172_1: Atthi hi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t:172_3: atthi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako ceva sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno ca,
tika-vin09t:172_4: atthi puggalo neva sikkhāpaccakkhātako na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno.
tika-vin09t:172_6: Sā hi yāva na liṅgaṃ pariccajati,
tika-vin09t:172_7: kāsāvesu saussāhāva samānā sāmaññā cavitukāmā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantīpi bhikkhunī eva sikkhāsājīvasamāpannāva.
tika-vin09t:172_16: Sāmaññā cavitukāmā kāsāvesu anālayā kāsāvaṃ vā apaneti,
tika-vin09t:172_21: liṅgeneva vā saddhiṃ titthiyesu pavisitvā kesaluñcanādivataṃ samādiyati,
tika-vin09t:172_24: Tattha yā saliṅge ṭhitāva titthiyavataṃ samādiyati,
tika-vin09t:172_25: sā titthiyapakkantabhikkhu viya pacchā pabbajjampi na labhati.
tika-vin09t:172_31: sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā”ti vacanato yā paṭhamaṃ vibbhamitvā pacchā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā,
tika-vin09t:172_32: sā āgatā upasampādetabbāti anuññātaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin09t:172_33: Saṅgītiācariyehi pana “catuvīsati pārājikānī”ti vuttattā na puna sā upasampādetabbā.
tika-vin09t:172_37: Imaṃ nayaṃ catūsupi yojetvā yathārahaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:176_0: Aññatra supinantāti svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamatthā,
tika-vin09t:176_2: Pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhitā vipākaṃ deti.
tika-vin09t:176_4: atha kho avisaye uppannattā abbohārikāva supinantacetanāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:176_5: Yaṃ panettha “supine upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittañhi dubbala”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:176_7: na ca ārammaṇadubbalatāya cittappavatti dubbalā atītānāgatārammaṇāya,
tika-vin09t:176_9: Tasmā dubbalavatthukattāti dubbalahadayavatthukattāti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t:176_12: Bhāvanābalasamappitañhi cittaṃ arūpampi samānaṃ atibhārampi karajakāyaṃ gahetvā ekacittakkhaṇeneva brahmalokampi pāpetvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t:176_13: tappaṭibhāgaṃ anappitampi kāmāvacaracittaṃ karajakāyaṃ ākāse laṅghanasamatthaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t:176_18: kāyoti tidhā sukkassa ṭhānaṃ pakappenti ācariyā.
tika-vin09t:176_23: rāgavasena upakkamantassa hotīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t:177_3: nimitte upakkamaṃ katvā sukkaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā puna vippaṭisāravasena dakasotorohaṇaṃ nivāretuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin09t:177_4: tathāpi adhivāsādhippāyena adhivāsetvā antarā dakasotato uddhaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya “bahi nikkhante vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:177_5: tasmā ṭhānā cutañhi avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otaratīti aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:178_1: kasmā imasmiṃ sikkhāpade “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādinā kārako na niddiṭṭhoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t:178_2: adhippāyāpekkhāya bhāvato kārako na niddiṭṭho tassa sāpekkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t:178_3: Kaṇḍuvanādiadhippāyacetanāvasena cetentassa kaṇḍuvanādiupakkamena upakkamantassa methunarāgavasena ūruādīsu dukkaṭavatthūsu,
tika-vin09t:178_4: vaṇādīsu thullaccayavatthūsu ca upakkamantassa sukkavisaṭṭhiyā satipi na saṅghādiseso “anāpatti bhikkhu na mocanādhippāyassā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin09t:178_5: Tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ idha kārako na niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t:178_6: Aññathā “yo pana bhikkhu sañcetanikaṃ sukkavisaṭṭhiṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-vin09t:178_7: saṅghādiseso”ti niddiṭṭhe kārake “ceteti na upakkamati muccati,
tika-vin09t:178_9: Tathā “sañcetanikāya sukkavisaṭṭhiyā aññatra supinantā saṅghādiseso”ti bhumme niddiṭṭhepi so eva virodho hetvatthaniyamasiddhito.
tika-vin09t:178_10: Tasmā tadubhayampi vacanakkamaṃ avatvā “sañcetanikā sukkavisaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā saṅghādiseso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:178_11: Tattha nimittatthe bhummavacanābhāvato hetvatthaniyamo na kato hoti.
tika-vin09t:178_12: Tasmiṃ akate sañcetanikā sukkavisaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā saṅghādisesoti,
tika-vin09t:178_13: upakkame asati anāpattīti ayamattho dīpito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:179_0: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade dve āpattisahassāni honti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t:179_1: Attano hatthādibhede ajjhattarūpe rāgūpatthambhanavasena aṅgajāte kammaniyappatte ārogyatthāya nīlaṃ mocentassa ekā āpatti,
tika-vin09t:179_2: ajjhattarūpe eva rāgūpatthambhe pītakādīnaṃ mocanavasena navāti dasa.
tika-vin09t:179_3: Evaṃ “sukhatthāyā”tiādīnaṃ navannaṃ vasenāti rāgūpatthambhe ajjhattarūpavasena sataṃ.
tika-vin09t:179_4: Evamevaṃ vaccappassāvavātauccāliṅgapāṇakadaṭṭhūpatthambhesu ca sataṃ sataṃ katvā sabbaṃ pañcasataṃ.
tika-vin09t:179_6: evaṃ bahiddhārūpe vā ajjhattabahiddhārūpe vā ākāse vā kaṭiṃ kampentoti dve sahassāni āpattiyo hontīti.
tika-vin09t:182_9: “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti imināssa vāyamato phassappaṭivijānanā dassitā hoti.
tika-vin09t:182_10: Vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭivijānanto hi samāpajjati nāma.
tika-vin09t:182_12: Atha vā otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena yakkhādinā satto viya.
tika-vin09t:182_14: otiṇṇo vipariṇataṃ cittaṃ kūpādiṃ viya satto.
tika-vin09t:182_15: Atha vā “rāgato uttiṇṇo bhavissāmī”ti bhikkhubhāvaṃ upagatopi yo pana bhikkhu tato uttiṇṇādhippāyato
tika-vin09t:182_16: vipariṇatena cittena hetubhūtena tameva rāgaṃ otiṇṇo.
tika-vin09t:183_0: Hatthaggāhaṃ vāti ettha hatthena sabbopi upādinnako kāyo saṅgahito,
tika-vin09t:183_2: Veṇiggahaṇena anupādinnako abhinnasantāno kesalomanakhaggadantaggādiko kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:183_5: parāmasananti ettha anupādinnakānampi sesalomādīnaṃ aṅgabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:183_6: Evaṃ sante “phassaṃ paṭijānantassa saṅghādiseso”ti iminā virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:183_11: Tasmā eva idha phassappaṭivijānanaṃ aṅgantveva na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:183_12: Tasmiñhi vutte ṭhānametaṃ vijjati “na ca me lomaghaṭṭanena kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin09t:183_15: tattha ‘veṇiṃ gaṇhissāmī’ti kahāpaṇamālādiṃ eva gaṇhāti, na lomaṃ,
tika-vin09t:186_0: “Kadā te mātā pasīdissatī”ti āyācanaṃ duṭṭhullavācāya sikhāpattalakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:186_6: kathaṃ ‘animittāsī’tiādīni padāni na saṅghādisesaṃ janentī”ti eke,
tika-vin09t:186_8: “Methunupasaṃhitāhi saṅghādiseso”ti mātikāyaṃ lakkhaṇassa vuttattā ca methunupasaṃhitāhi obhāsane paṭivijānantiyā saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin09t:186_17: Tasmā rāgavaseneva pavatto akkoso idha adhippeto.
tika-vin09t:189_3: tassa aggadānaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti pariyāyavacanepi dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t:189_5: yā mādisaṃ sīlavanta”nti ca vuttattāti eke.
tika-vin09t:189_8: “Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsupi duṭṭhullattakaāmavacane thullaccayanti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:192_4: āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti vuttattā yassa ekantena saṅghādiseso hoti,
tika-vin09t:192_5: tassa paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapayogā ete dukkaṭathullaccayā natthīti vadantīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:192_7: na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā.
tika-vin09t:192_9: na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato”ti pāḷi natthi,
tika-vin09t:192_10: tathāpi kāyasaṃsaggādīsu “mātugāmo nāma manussitthī”ti itthivavatthānassa katattā idhāpi manussitthī evāti paññāyati.
tika-vin09t:195_2: taṃ kathetuṃ labhati pucchitapaññattā bhikkhācāravatteti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:195_9: so tattha ito ca na sañcarati,
tika-vin09t:195_11: Akuṭiyā pana vatthudesanākiccaṃ natthi ullittāvalittaṃ kātuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:195_15: Yasmā mattikāmayabhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā upari ullittaṃ vā avalittaṃ vā ubhayaṃ vā bhittiyā ghaṭitaṃ karontassa āpatti eva vināpi bhittilepenā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:195_19: ahampi vasissāmī”ti vā “bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā ekato vasissāmī”ti vā karontassa vaṭṭati eva. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t:196_0: Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ catutthapārājikaṃ viya nidānāpekkhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:196_1: Na hi vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū sayameva attano asantaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ pāpetvā bhāsiṃsu.
tika-vin09t:196_4: tattakena pana lesena bhagavā taṃ vatthuṃ nidānaṃ katvā pārājikaṃ paññapesi,
tika-vin09t:196_6: Na hi nidāne “adesitavatthukāyo sārambhāyo aparikkamanāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:196_8: Tattha sārambhe aparikkamane saṅghādisesappasaṅgaṃ viya dissamānaṃ “vibhaṅgo taṃniyamako”ti vuttattā vibhaṅge na nivāreti.
tika-vin09t:197_2: nanu vibhaṅge eva vattabbaṃ siyāti? Evametaṃ.
tika-vin09t:197_6: Itarañhi “sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane”ti evaṃ anuppasaṅgavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:197_7: Yasmā vatthu nāma atthi sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t:197_11: tasmā bahuvidhattā vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t:197_17: attadukkhaparadukkhahetubhūto ca sārambhabhāvoti ete vatthudesanāpadesena upāyena parivajjitā honti.
tika-vin09t:197_18: Na hi bhikkhū akappiyakuṭikaraṇatthaṃ gihīnaṃ vā pīḷānimittaṃ,
tika-vin09t:201_0: Vajjitā honti yaṃ tasmā, sārambhādi jahāpita”nti.
tika-vin09t:204_4: “Āyasmā channo cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesī”ti āgatattā idampi nidānāpekkhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:207_1: ‘ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ etī’ti vuttattā antimavatthuajjhāpannakaṃ vandituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:207_5: “pacchā upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo”ti vuttattā ca,
tika-vin09t:207_6: tasmā eva imissaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “upasampannoti saṅkhyupagamana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:207_8: avandanto sāmīcippaṭikkhepasaṅkhātāya codanāya codeti nāmāti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
tika-vin09t:207_9: Tasmā eva “ettāvatā ca codanā nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:207_10: Idha adhippetaṃ āpattiāpajjanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “‘kasmā mama vandanādīni na karosī’tiādi vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:208_11: kārato yāva ayaṃ sabbapacchimo ṭi- kāro,
tika-vin09t:208_13: Uposathe pana iminānusārena viseso veditabbo “kareyyā”ti re-
tika-vin09t:211_0: Aññabhāgo vā assa atthīti yathā suvaṇṇassedaṃ sovaṇṇamityatra suvaṇṇavā anena suvaṇṇo ityuccate.
tika-vin09t:211_11: tasmā “kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “dasa lesā jātileso”tiādi padabhājane vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:212_0: Aṭṭhuppattivaseneva āvibhūtanti ettha kiñca bhiyyo aniyamattā.
tika-vin09t:212_1: Na hi mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ viya aññesaṃ sabbesampi “chagalakamevettha aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:212_3: na ca mettiyabhūmajakā viya sabbepi nāmalesamattameva upādiyanti,
tika-vin09t:212_6: Kiñca bhiyyo tathāvutte chagalakasseva aññabhāgiyatā sambhavati,
tika-vin09t:212_11: yena sova dassitoti evaṃ micchāgāhappasaṅgatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:212_13: saññinopīti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ca amūlakasikkhāpade cāti attho.
tika-vin09t:217_1: karotīti ettha “ime cattāro”ti vā “imañca imañcā”ti vā vatvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:220_0: Dukkhena vattabbo dubbaco. Vuccamāno na sahati.
tika-vin09t:223_3: “ayaṃ kiriyā bhikkhūnaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti jānitvā sace chādeti,
tika-vin09t:224_0: Vatthu ceva gottañcāti ettha vatthūti vītikkamanaṃ asucimuccanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:224_2: sajātito aññattha gantuṃ adatvā gaṃ buddhiṃ,
tika-vin09t:224_7: Nāmañceva āpatti cāti ettha āpattīti vītikkamenāpannāpattiyā nāmaṃ.
tika-vin09t:225_0: Puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentenāti ettha dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentu”tiṇṇaṃ vā atirekānaṃ
tika-vin09t:225_1: vā ārocentena “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti evaṃ ārocanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:225_2: Vattabhedañca ratticchedañca akatvāti ettha ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ antamaso mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādīnampi abhivādanādisādiyane,
tika-vin09t:225_5: Dassanasavanavisayesu anārocane ca bhikkhūhi ekacchanne vasane ca ajānantasseva vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ āgantvā gamane cātiādīsu ratticchedo hoti.
tika-vin09t:225_6: Nānāsaṃvāsakehi vinayakammābhāvato tesaṃ anārocane ratticchedo na hoti.
tika-vin09t:225_7: “Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vacanato anto na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:225_8: Nikkhittavatteneva hutvā vicarantena yassa santike pubbe samādiyitvā ārocitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:225_9: tassāpi santike pacchā nikkhipanakāle ārocetvāva nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:225_10: Tasmā puna samādānakālepi so ce tato gacchati,
tika-vin09t:225_11: taṃ divasaṃ agantvā divā ārocetvāpi yadi evaṃ atītadivasaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:225_12: “aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vihāraṃ gantabbanti tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:225_13: Apica “vihāraṃ gantvā yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
tika-vin09t:225_17: “Tassa ārocetvā”ti idaṃ pana pubbe anārocitaṃ sandhāya vattabhedarakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:225_18: Tasmā eva samantapāsādikāyaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ “aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā”ti.
tika-vin09t:226_1: parivasanto puna ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:227_3: mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā pubbe gahitaparivāseneva parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:227_4: Yo pana āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno hutvāpi paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin09t:227_5: yo ca pubbe paṭicchādetvā pacchā na paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin09t:227_8: “Purimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe vā”ti ca “pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe vā”ti ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā dve bhikkhū visuddhikaṃ āpannā honti,
tika-vin09t:227_14: “Ubhopi yathādhammaṃ kārāpetabbā”ti vacanato yaṃ kañci āpattiṃ chādetvā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:228_0: Tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayeneva paṭipajjitabbanti ettha ūne gaṇe caraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t:228_3: sace so pure aruṇameva kenaci karaṇīyena gatoti etthapi mānattepi evaṃ jāte.
tika-vin09t:228_6: tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hotī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:228_7: Tasmā tena ārocite muhuttampi nisīditvā gatepi vippavāso natthi.
tika-vin09t:228_9: ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena tasmiṃ vasanaṃ udakapātena vāritaṃ,
tika-vin09t:229_5: Aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vāti tesaṃ dvidhā bhinnānampi vuṭṭhānakkamabhedābhāvadīpakavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:229_9: Tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabbanti tena bhikkhunā vasatā akāmā parivatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:229_11: Parivutthaparivāsenāti ādimhi parivutthaparivāseneva parivāsato uttari itivārena ādito bhikkhunāva chārattaṃ,
tika-vin09t:229_16: pakkhamānattañca carantiyā bhikkhuniyā liṅgaṃ parivattātikkame sati ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu hoti,
tika-vin09t:229_17: puna bhikkhumānattaṃ gahetvā ciṇṇamānattova bhikkhu abbhetabboti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:230_0: Yattha siyāti yassaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyampi vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi.
tika-vin09t:230_1: Ekenapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇoti na yujjati, ūno ce.
tika-vin09t:230_4: Tasmā “ekenapi ce ūno saṅgho”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:230_6: Tasmā vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ce bhikkhunā ekenapi ūno,
tika-vin09t:230_8: Keci pana vinaye appakataññuno “yathā atirekacatuvaggopi saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīye kamme ‘catuvaggo’ti vuccati,
tika-vin09t:230_14: taṃ ṭhapetvā ekenapi ceti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:230_15: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti vacanaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ sabbattha “tassa āpattiyā parivāsaṃ deti,
tika-vin09t:230_20: Tena tesu ayaṃ yathāvuttā sāmīci niyatā icchitabbā,
tika-vin09t:230_22: Tattha hi kenaci antarāyena taṃ sāmīcimakarontepi anāpattīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:234_2: idaṃ aniyatakaṇḍaṃ nippayojanaṃ tattha apubbābhāvatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:234_4: Ettha hi “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo mayā…pe…
tika-vin09t:234_16: Tasmā garukalahukānaṃ majjhe eva uddisitabbataṃ arahati ubhayamissakattā.
tika-vin09t:234_20: Tasmā garukānaṃ eva anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhantipi eke.
tika-vin09t:234_24: “Paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye”ti okāsaniyamato hi tabbiparīte okāse idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na vikappitanti micchāgāho hoti.
tika-vin09t:234_30: Dvinnaṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadānaṃ nānāttajānanañca siyā tathā kāyasaṃsaggabhedadīpanato.
tika-vin09t:234_32: paṭicchannepi vā nisinnāya vātapānakavāṭacchiddādīhi nikkhantakesādiggahaṇena kāyasaṃsaggo labbhatīti evamādayopi nayā vitthārato veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:235_2: Paṭicchannampi hi ekaccaṃ nālaṃkammaniyaṃ vātapānādinā antaritattā,
tika-vin09t:235_4: Rahobhedadīpanatoti ettha rahabhāvasāmaññepi raho dvidhā paṭicchannāpaṭicchannabhedatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:235_6: duṭṭhullassādavasena nisajjāti tādisassa bhedassa dīpanatoti attho.
tika-vin09t:235_7: “Idha āgatanayattā bhikkhunipātimokkhe idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ parihīnanti veditabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:235_17: kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya upasaṃhareyyā”ti vacanato sādiyanampi,
tika-vin09t:235_22: paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā”ti vacanato duṭṭhullavācāpi pācittiyavatthukanti
tika-vin09t:235_23: katvā tāsaṃ aññathā aniyatakaṇḍassa avattabbatāpattito na vuttanti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:236_0: “Desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ āpattīnaṃ vasena alajjiādayo lajjīnaṃ codessantī”ti āgatattā lajjipaggahatthāya
tika-vin09t:236_1: patirūpāyapi upāsikāya vacanena akatvā bhikkhusseva paṭiññāya kātabbanti āpattiyo pana lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t:236_2: paññattaṃ vitthāranayameva gahetvā vattuṃ yuttaṃ “ime kho panāyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā”ti uddesadassanattāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:236_3: Sotassa rahoti ettha rahoti vacanasāmaññato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:236_5: Tasmā “cakkhusseva pana raho ‘raho’ti idha adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:236_8: antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā”ti vuttattā duṭṭhullobhāsanaṃ idha nādhippetanti dīpitamevāti.
tika-vin09t:236_10: saddena apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinnopīti attho.
tika-vin09t:236_11: Acelakavagge rahopaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpade “yo koci viññū puriso dutiyo hotī”ti imassa anurūpato “itthīnaṃ
tika-vin09t:236_12: pana satampi anāpattiṃ na karotiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:236_13: “Alaṃkammaniyeti sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vibhaṅge vacanato rahonisajjassādo cettha methunadhammasannissitakileso,
tika-vin09t:236_15: Tasmā ca paññāyati sotassa raho nādhippetoti.
tika-vin09t:237_0: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyyāti rahonisajjasikkhāpadavasena nisinnassa tassānusārena pācittiyameva
tika-vin09t:237_2: Puna āpattippaṭijānanaṃ avatvā kasmā “nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno”ti vatthuppaṭijānanaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t:237_3: āpattiyā codite vinayadharena “kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti pucchite cuditakena “imasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti vutte
tika-vin09t:237_4: vinayadharena “īdisaṃ nāma akāsī”ti pucchite so vatthuṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabboti dassanatthaṃ “nisajjaṃ
tika-vin09t:237_6: Yadi evaṃ nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānopi āpattiyāva kāretabboti?
tika-vin09t:237_9: tiṇṇampi āpattīnaṃ vatthūni aggahetvā idha sikkhāpadavasena nisajjameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:237_10: Tasmiṃ gahitepi hi āpatti gahitāva hotīti.
tika-vin09t:237_12: saddo “tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo vā”ti yojetabbo.
tika-vin09t:237_17: Rahonisajjasikkhāpadavasena nisajjapaccayā āpattiyā vuttattā sesesupi sesasikkhāpadavasena āpatti gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t:237_18: “Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevā”ti vuttattā idha duṭṭhullobhāsanassa anadhippetabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:240_5: Ettha ca kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhānaṃ kathanti ce?
tika-vin09t:253_2: puggalassa atthārā saṅghassa atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanato tesaṃyeva anumodanādidhammānaṃ saṅgaho kathinaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t:253_3: Yathāha “kathinaṃ jānitabbanti tesaññeva dhammānaṃ saṅgaho samavāyo nāmaṃ nāmakamma”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t:253_4: Tasmā kathinanti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ,
tika-vin09t:253_8: Yathā cāha “atthāro ekena dhammena saṅgahito vacībhedenā”ti.
tika-vin09t:253_15: Cīvarasamayo nāma anatthate kathine ayaṃ kattikamāso,
tika-vin09t:253_16: atthate cattāro hemantikā cāti pañca māsā.
tika-vin09t:254_1: Tā sabbāpi atthārena ekato uppajjanti nāma.
tika-vin09t:254_3: Tattha kathinatthārena ekuppādā ekanirodhā antarubbhāro sahubbhāro,
tika-vin09t:254_9: Tesu hi uddhārabhāvaṃ pattesupi atthāro tiṭṭhati evāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthavibhāvanā.
tika-vin09t:254_10: Sace atthate kathine bhikkhusmiṃ sāpekkhe tamhā āvāsā pakkamante saṅgho antarubbhāraṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:254_11: tassa bhikkhuno paṭhamameva mūlāvāse niṭṭhitacīvarapalibodhābhāvepi sati antarubbhāre palibodho chijjati satipi sāpekkhatāya saussāhattā.
tika-vin09t:254_12: Iminā pariyāyena pakkamanantiko kathinuddhāro atthārena ekuppādo nānānirodho hoti.
tika-vin09t:254_13: Tathā antarubbhāre sati suṇantassāpi yāva cīvaraniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin09t:255_0: Tattha antarubbhārasahubbhārā dve antosīmāyaṃ eva sambhavanti,
tika-vin09t:256_3: tasmā ubhayapalibodhābhāvadīpanatthaṃ tadeva vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t:256_5: Kāmañcetaṃ tasmā “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti kesañci kathinuddhārānaṃ nānānirodhattā,
tika-vin09t:256_6: saṅghapuggalādhīnānadhīnattā ca antobahiubhayasīmāsu niyamāniyamato ca ubbhatasmiṃ kathine saṅghassa,
