tika-vin09t:1008_2: Kilesehi ārakattā parisuddhaṭṭhena ariyanti āha “ariyaṃ visuddhaṃ uttama”nti.
tika-vin09t:1008_20: so bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī”tiādinā nayena aññāpadesaṃ vināti attho.
tika-vin09t:1009_7: katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī’ti kenaci vuccamāno”ti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1010_0: “Bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā abhabbo jhānādīni adhigantu”nti sikkhāpadātikkamassa antarāyakarattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1010_1: Bhikkhubhāvo hissa saggantarāyo ceva hoti maggantarāyo ca.
tika-vin09t:1010_6: Bhikkhubhāvoti pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā “samaṇo aha”nti paṭijānanato vohāramattasiddho bhikkhubhāvo.
tika-vin09t:1011_4: Vacanatthavirahatoti “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”nti ādivacanassa atthabhūtena jhānādinā vajjitattā tucchaṃ udakādisuññaṃ bhājanaṃ viya.
tika-vin09t:1011_13: itaraṃ pana hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t:1012_12: suparisuddhasīlassa pana kammaṭṭhāne appamattassa nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā paccayapariggahena vitiṇṇakaṅkhassa
tika-vin09t:1012_13: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddhavipassakassa uppajjati.
tika-vin09t:1012_15: Tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāti kalāpasammasanavasena aniccādilakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā.
tika-vin09t:1012_20: Pattasaññitāsaṅkhātoti “patto mayā uttarimanussadhammo”ti evaṃsaññitāsaṅkhāto adhimāno uppajjati.
tika-vin09t:1012_21: Uppanno ca suddhasamathalābhiṃ vā suddhavipassanālābhiṃ vā antarā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin09t:1012_22: So hi dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi vassāni kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto “ahaṃ sotāpanno”ti vā “sakadāgāmī”ti vā “anāgāmī”ti vā maññati.
tika-vin09t:1012_30: So evaṃ dīgharattaṃ kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto antarā aṭṭhatvāva “arahā aha”nti maññatīti.
tika-vin09t:1012_31: “Taṃ adhimānaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti iminā “aññatrā”ti padaṃ apekkhitvā “adhimānā”ti upayogatthe nissakkavacananti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1013_3: Yā sā “idhekacco dussīlova samāno ‘sīlavā’ti maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena vuttā,
tika-vin09t:1013_5: Iminā pana mandattā momūhattā samudācarantassa anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1013_7: saddena na kevalaṃ purimā tayovāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1014_9: Yassa ārocetīti vācāya vā hatthavikārādīhi vā aṅgapaccaṅgacopanehi viññattipathe ṭhitassa yassa puggalassa āroceti.
tika-vin09t:1014_10: Viññattipathaṃ pana atikkamitvā ṭhito koci ce dibbena cakkhunā,
tika-vin09t:1014_11: dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā disvā ca sutvā ca jānāti,
tika-vin09t:1014_13: Yopi “kiṃ ayaṃ bhaṇatī”ti saṃsayaṃ vā āpajjati,
tika-vin09t:1014_16: Yo pana jhānādīni attano adhigamavasena vā uggahaparipucchādivasena vā na jānāti,
tika-vin09t:1014_17: kevalaṃ “jhāna”nti vā “vimokkho”ti vā vacanamattameva sutaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1014_18: sopi tena vutte “jhānaṃ kira samāpajjī”ti esa vadatīti yadi ettakamattampi jānāti,
tika-vin09t:1014_21: Seso pana ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā bahūnaṃ vā niyamitāniyamitavasena viseso sabbo sikkhāpaccakkhānakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:1014_22: Pariyāyabhāsane pana “aha”nti avuttattā paṭivijānantassa vuttepi thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1014_23: Visaṃvādanādhippāyena musāvādapayogassa katattā appaṭivijānantassāpi dukkaṭanti āha “yo te vihāre vasati…pe…
tika-vin09t:1017_4: Tattha samodhānetvāti tattha tattha āgatāni ettheva samodahitvā,
tika-vin09t:1017_10: aṭṭhavatthukāti imāni bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni cattāri.
tika-vin09t:1017_11: Paṇḍakādīnañhi ekādasannaṃ abhabbabhāvo pārājikāpattisadisattā pārājikoti āha “ekādasanna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t:1017_26: saṅghabhedakoti ime aṭṭha attano kiriyāya vipannattā abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pattāti pārājikāva.
tika-vin09t:1017_33: Yadā bhikkhunī vibbhamitukāmā hutvā kāsāvameva vā gihivatthaṃ vā gihinivāsanākārena nivāseti,
tika-vin09t:1017_34: tadā pārājikamāpannā nāma hotīti āha “gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1017_35: Sā hi ajjhācāravītikkamaṃ akatvāpi ettāvatā assamaṇī nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t:1018_2: atha kho yadā anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ mukhe vā vaccamagge vā paveseti,
tika-vin09t:1018_6: Sopi yadā anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ attano mukhamaggavaccamaggesu aññataraṃ paveseti,
tika-vin09t:1018_8: Parassa aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhātīti yo anabhiratiyā pīḷito parassa suttassa vā pamattassa vā aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t:1018_9: Parassa aṅgajāte abhinisīdatīti yo anabhiratiyā pīḷito parassa aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ disvā attano vaccamaggena tassūpari nisīdati,
tika-vin09t:1018_11: Etāni hi cattāri yasmā ubhinnaṃ rāgavasena sadisabhāvūpagatānaṃ dhammo “methunadhammo”ti vuccati,
tika-vin09t:1018_12: tasmā ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ appaṭisevitvāyeva kevalaṃ maggena maggappavesanavasena āpajjitabbattā
tika-vin09t:1019_3: lambiādayo cattāro ca paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t:1019_4: mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idha anupasampannā eva adhippetā,
tika-vin09t:1019_6: yasmā pana ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ appaṭisevino honti,
tika-vin09t:1019_8: Dutiyavikappe kaccitthāti ettha kacci atthāti padacchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t:1024_2: Sādhavo hi pare “bhonto”ti vā “devānaṃpiyā”ti vā “bhadrabhava”nti vā “āyasmanto”ti vā samālapanti.
tika-vin09t:1026_6: saddassa visuṃ attho natthīti āha “sañcetanāva sañcetanikā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1027_4: taṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvetvā sarūpato taṃ visaṭṭhiṃ dassetuṃ “rāgūpatthambhādīsū”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1027_17: taṃ ādi yesaṃ te ajjhattarūpādayo, tesu.
tika-vin09t:1027_23: Iminā muccanassādo muttassādo methunassādo phassassādo kaṇḍuvanassādo dassanassādo nisajjassādo vācassādo
tika-vin09t:1027_24: gehasitapemaṃ vanabhaṅgiyanti imehi sampayuttā cetanāyo paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t:1027_27: Tena hi satipi mocanassāde nimitte upakkamābhāvato muttepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t:1027_28: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sā ca kho nimitte upakkamantasseva,
tika-vin09t:1028_4: Sukkassa hi vatthisīsaṃ kaṭi kāyoti tidhā ṭhānaṃ pakappenti.
tika-vin09t:1028_11: thaddhasukkhacammāni ca vajjetvā avaseso chavimaṃsalohitānugato sabbopi kāyo kāyappasādabhāvajīvitindriyābaddhapittānaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1028_13: Tathā hi rāgapariyuṭṭhānenābhibhūtānaṃ hatthīnaṃ ubhohi kaṇṇacūḷikāhi sambhavo nikkhamati.
tika-vin09t:1029_4: Na hi vinā rāgūpatthambhādīhi pubbaṇhādayo kālabhedā mocane nimittaṃ honti.
tika-vin09t:1029_14: Nīlādivasenā”tiādīhi pana dasahi navamassa adhippāyassa vatthu dassitaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1029_17: “Ṭhānā cāvanā”ti iminā pana atthato vissaṭṭhi dassitā.
tika-vin09t:1029_19: Sā cāyaṃ tassa sukkassa ṭhānā cāvanā rāgavasena.
tika-vin09t:1029_29: pana avayave samūhavohārena vā “nikāyo”ti vutto “eko vedanākkhandho,
tika-vin09t:1030_1: Nanu ca ayuttoyaṃ niddeso “saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1030_2: Na hi āpattinikāyassa ādimhi ceva sese ca saṅgho icchito,
tika-vin09t:1030_3: kiñcarahi vuṭṭhānassāti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya yathā na virujjhati,
tika-vin09t:1030_5: Āpattito vuṭṭhānassa ādimhi ceva sese ca icchito saṅgho āpattiyāva icchito nāma hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:1031_2: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dakasotaṃ otiṇṇamatte”ti vuttanti āha “ṭhānato pana cuta”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t:1031_3: Avassameva dakasotaṃ otarati adhivāsetvā antarā nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-vin09t:1031_4: Dakasotorohanato paṭṭhāya pana upādinnato vinimuttattā sambhavarūpaṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva avasissati,
tika-vin09t:1031_6: Tasmāti yasmā ṭhānato cutaṃ dakasotaṃ otarati, tasmā.
tika-vin09t:1032_0: Amocanādhippāyassāti bhesajjena nimittaṃ ālimpantassa uccārādīni vā karontassa.
tika-vin09t:1032_1: Supinaṃ passantassāti dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi supinaṃ passantassa.
tika-vin09t:1032_10: taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ vā rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti.
tika-vin09t:1032_11: Supinaṃ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti.
tika-vin09t:1032_16: Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t:1032_17: Supinaṃ passantena pana katepi vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva.
tika-vin09t:1032_18: Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati,
tika-vin09t:1032_25: Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1032_26: evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā,
tika-vin09t:1032_27: yassā pavattiyaṃ punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1032_29: Yassa ca evaṃ passantassa supine methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa viya,
tika-vin09t:1032_30: kāyasaṃsaggādīni āpajjantassa viya ca supinanteneva kāraṇena asuci muccati,
tika-vin09t:1032_32: Supine pana uppannāya assādacetanāya sacassa visayo hoti,
tika-vin09t:1032_35: Kāsāvapaccattharaṇarakkhaṇatthaṃ pana hatthapuṭena gahetvā jagganatthāya udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1035_1: kattusādhanaṃ vā hotīti tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento “yakkhādīhi viya sattā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1035_3: yathā te ratijanakā rūpādayo visayā aniccadukkhāsubhānattākārena avaṭṭhitā,
tika-vin09t:1035_8: Tadahujātāyapīti tasmiṃ ahani jātaṃ jananaṃ etissāti tadahujātā,
tika-vin09t:1035_9: tasmiṃ ahani jātāti vā tadahujātā, tāya,
tika-vin09t:1036_1: Idāni hatthādīnaṃ vibhāgadassanatthaṃ “tattha hattho nāma kapparato paṭṭhāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1036_3: Aññattha pana maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā hattho.
tika-vin09t:1036_4: Vinandhitvā vā avinandhitvā vā katakesakalāpassetaṃ adhivacananti sambandho.
tika-vin09t:1036_7: Hatthañca veṇiñca ṭhapetvā avasesasarīraṃ aṅganti āha “avasesassa sarīrassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1037_0: Yo hi sevanādhippāyopi niccalena kāyena kevalaṃ phassaṃ paṭivijānāti sādiyati anubhoti,
tika-vin09t:1037_1: tassa cittuppādamatte āpattiyā abhāvato anāpattīti āha “kāyena avāyamitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1037_4: Evañhi acetetvā pattappaṭiggahaṇādīsu mātugāmassa aṅge phuṭṭhepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t:1037_8: Ajānantassāti dārakavesena ṭhitaṃ dārikaṃ “itthī”ti ajānanto kenacideva karaṇīyena phusati,
tika-vin09t:1037_10: Asādiyantassāti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ asādiyantassa bāhāparamparāya nītabhikkhussa viya anāpatti.
tika-vin09t:1040_7: Vaṇṇo nāma dve magge uddissa “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”tiādinā thomanā.
tika-vin09t:1040_8: Avaṇṇo nāma dve magge uddissa vuttavipariyāyena garahanā,
tika-vin09t:1040_15: kadā te sukhaṇo sulayo sumuhutto bhavissati,
tika-vin09t:1040_16: kadā te methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”ti vacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1040_19: Paṭipucchanaṃ nāma “evaṃ kira tvaṃ sāmikassa deti,
tika-vin09t:1040_38: Yasmā methunupasaṃhitāya vācāya adhikaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin09t:1041_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇabhaṇane tāva “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t:1041_2: “Tava vaccamaggo ca passāvamaggo ca subho subhasaṇṭhāno dassanīyo,
tika-vin09t:1041_3: īdisena nāma itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t:1042_0: Avaṇṇabhaṇane pana “animittāsī”tiādīhi ekādasahi padehi avaṇṇe aghaṭite sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t:1042_1: ghaṭitepi tesu “sikharaṇīsi sambhinnāsi ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imehi tīhi ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t:1043_0: Yācanāyapi “dehi me”ti ettakeneva sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t:1043_1: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ methunadhammena ghaṭite eva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t:1044_0: “Kadā te mātā pasīdissatī”tiādīsu āyācanavacanesupi ettakeneva sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t:1044_2: kadā te methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”ti vā “tava mātari pasannāya vā methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t:1045_0: “Kathaṃ tvaṃ sāmikassa desī”tiādīsu pucchāvacanesupi “methunaṃ dhamma”nti vutteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t:1045_1: “Evaṃ kira tvaṃ sāmikassa desī”ti paṭipucchāvacanesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t:1046_4: evaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dadamānā upanayamānā sāmikassa piyā hotī”tiādinā pana nayena methunadhammena ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t:1047_0: Akkosavacanesu pana ekādasasu “sikharaṇīsi sambhinnāsi ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imāni tīṇiyeva padāni suddhāni sīsaṃ enti,
tika-vin09t:1047_2: purimāni ca vaccamaggapassāvamaggamethunadhammapadāni tīṇīti cha padāni suddhāni āpattikarāni,
tika-vin09t:1047_3: sesāni “animittāsī”tiādīni animitte “methunaṃ dhammaṃ me dehī”ti vā “animittāsi,
tika-vin09t:1047_4: methunaṃ dhammaṃ me dehī”ti vā ādinā nayena methunadhammena ghaṭitāneva āpattikarāni hontīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin09t:1048_4: pana jāṇumaṇḍalañca ettheva dukkaṭakhette saṅgahaṃ gacchati bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsagge viya.
tika-vin09t:1048_5: Na hi buddhā garukāpattiṃ sāvasesaṃ paññāpentīti.
tika-vin09t:1048_6: Kāyappaṭibaddhanti vatthaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā ābharaṇaṃ vā.
tika-vin09t:1049_1: aṭṭhakathaṃ vā sajjhāyaṃ karonto atthapurekkhāro nāma,
tika-vin09t:1049_7: yathā āyatimpi evarūpā mā hohisī”ti bhaṇanto anusāsanipurekkhāro nāma.
tika-vin09t:1049_8: Iti atthañca dhammañca anusāsaniñca purakkhitvā bhaṇantānaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin09t:1049_9: Yo pana bhikkhunīnaṃ pāḷiṃ vācento pakativācanāmaggaṃ pahāya hasanto hasanto “sikharaṇīsi,
tika-vin09t:1049_15: Nanu “sikharaṇī”tiādīhi akkosantassa paṭighacittaṃ uppajjatīti dukkhavedanāyapi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1052_1: Idhāpi duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullajānanasamatthāva itthī adhippetāti āha “duṭṭhullobhāsena vuttappakārāya itthiyā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1052_14: attakāmā ca sā pāricariyā cāti attakāmapāricariyā,
tika-vin09t:1052_17: Ettha ca paṭhamena atthavikappena kāmahetupāricariyāsaṅkhātaṃ atthattayaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin09t:1052_19: Byañjane pana ādaraṃ akatvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariya”nti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1052_20: “Attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano pāricariya”nti hi vutte jānissanti paṇḍitā “ettāvatā attano atthāya kāmapāricariyā vuttā”ti,
tika-vin09t:1052_21: “attano adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariya”nti vuttepi jānissanti “ettāvatā attanā icchitakāmitaṭṭhena attakāmapāricariyā vuttā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1054_1: Ubhatobyañjanako pana paṇḍakagatikattā visuṃ na vutto.
tika-vin09t:1054_2: “Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsupi duṭṭhullattakāmavacane thullaccaya”nti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:1054_3: Tasmiṃyevāti paṇḍakeyeva itthisaññino attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇabhaṇanepi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1054_5: tassa aggadānaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti pariyāyavacanepi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1054_6: “Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya yā mādisaṃ ‘sīlavanta’nti vuttattā”ti eke.
tika-vin09t:1057_5: Tañca parato “itthiyā vā purisamati”ntiādivacanato itthipurisānaṃ vemajjheti āha “itthipurisānaṃ antare sañcaraṇabhāva”nti.
tika-vin09t:1057_6: Paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapaccāharaṇānīti ettha paṭiggaṇhanaṃ nāma purisena vā itthiyā vā ubhinnaṃ mātādīhi vā “bhante,
tika-vin09t:1057_7: itthannāmaṃ itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti vutte tesaṃ vacanaṃ “sādhū”ti vā “hotū”ti vā “bhaṇāmī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena vacībhedaṃ katvā,
tika-vin09t:1057_9: Vīmaṃsanaṃ nāma vuttappakārena sāsanaṃ gahetvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā tesaṃ avassaṃ ārocanakānaṃ
tika-vin09t:1057_10: mātāpitubhātābhaginiādīnaṃ vā santikaṃ gantvā tassa sāsanassa ārocanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1057_11: Paccāharaṇaṃ nāma tena gantvā ārocite sā itthī vā puriso vā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchatu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t:1057_13: puna āgantvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā tassā pavattiyā ārocanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1058_0: Itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatinti ettha “āroceyyā”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:1058_9: “Jāyattane vā jārattane vā”ti hi idaṃ yadatthaṃ taṃ tesaṃ matiṃ āroceti,
tika-vin09t:1058_11: Idāni pana padabhājaniyaṃ vuttanayenāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1058_13: “jāyattane vā jārattane vā”ti pana niddesassa ubhayaliṅgasādhāraṇattā purisaliṅgavasenāpi yojetvā vattabbanti āha “eteneva upāyenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1059_0: Aññatra nālaṃvacanīyāyāti desacārittavasena paṇṇadānādinā apariccattaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin09t:1059_1: Sañcarittavasena bhikkhunā vacanīyā na hotīti nālaṃvacanīyā,
tika-vin09t:1059_3: Appena vā bahunā vā dhanena kītā dhanakkītā.
tika-vin09t:1059_4: Yasmā pana sā na kītamattāyeva bhariyā,
tika-vin09t:1059_7: Chandavāsinīti chandena attano ruciyā vasatīti chandavāsinī.
tika-vin09t:1059_8: Yasmā pana sā na attano chandamatteneva bhariyā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1059_19: Yathā ca “chandavāsinī”tiādīsu aññataravasena vadato visaṅketo natthi,
tika-vin09t:1059_20: evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttesupi “hohi kira itthannāmassa bhariyā, jāyā, pajāpati,
tika-vin09t:1059_25: paricārikā”ti evamādīsu saṃvāsaparidīpakesu vacanesu aññataravasena vadantassāpi visaṅketo natthi,
tika-vin09t:1060_0: Māturakkhitaṃ brūhīti ettha māturakkhitā nāma mātarā rakkhitā,
tika-vin09t:1060_1: yathā purisena saha saṃvāsaṃ na kappeti,
tika-vin09t:1061_0: Saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā gilānassa vā kiccena gacchantassāti ettha bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ vā kiñci vā vippakataṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1061_1: Tattha kārukānaṃ bhattavetanatthāya upāsako vā upāsikāya santikaṃ bhikkhuṃ pahiṇeyya,
tika-vin09t:1061_5: Gilānassa bhesajjatthāyapi upāsakena vā upāsikāya santikaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1061_6: upāsikāya vā upāsakassa santikaṃ pahitassa gacchato anāpatti.
tika-vin09t:1062_1: na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā.
tika-vin09t:1062_4: tathāpi manussajātikāva itthipurisā idha adhippetāti āha “tesaṃ manussajātikatā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1063_3: Tatheva vīmaṃsitvā tatheva paccāharantassāti hatthamuddādinā kāyavikārena vīmaṃsitvā puna āgantvā tatheva ārocentassa.
tika-vin09t:1063_5: Kenaci vutteti āsanasālādīsu nisinnassa kenaci purisena vutte.
tika-vin09t:1063_6: Sace hi khīṇāsavassa mātāpitaro kujjhitvā alaṃvacanīyā honti,
tika-vin09t:1063_7: tañca bhikkhuṃ gharaṃ upagataṃ pitā vadati “mātā te, tāta,
tika-vin09t:1063_10: So ce gantvā taṃ vatvā puna pituno tassā āgamanaṃ vā anāgamanaṃ vā āroceti,
tika-vin09t:1063_21: Yaṃ pana paṇṇattiṃ jānitvā eteheva tīhi nayehi sañcarittaṃ samāpajjato kāyacittato,
tika-vin09t:1063_26: Na hi paṇṇattiṃ jānitvāpi “nālaṃvacanīyā”ti maññamānassa sacittakehi samuṭṭhānehi āpatti samuṭṭhātīti vattuṃ yujjati vītikkamacetanāya asambhavato.
tika-vin09t:1066_0: Saññācikāya panāti ettha santi attavācako tatiyatthe nipāto,
tika-vin09t:1066_7: Nanu na sakkā yācanāyeva kuṭiṃ kātunti anuyogaṃ sandhāya tassādhippāyatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sayaṃ yācitakehī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1066_11: Parena bhaṇḍasāmikena “mama ida”nti apariccāgārakkhaṇagopanavasena pariggahitaṃ parapariggahitakaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1066_14: parasantakabhāvato mocetvā attano santakaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1066_16: Tāvakālikaṃ pana vaṭṭatīti tāvakālikaṃ katvā yācituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1066_20: bhante”ti bhikkhuṃ uyyojetvā migepi māretvā āhareyyuṃ.
tika-vin09t:1066_24: avalittā vā ullittāvalittā vā”ti padabhājane vuttattā “kuṭinti ullittādīsu aññatara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1066_31: “Sudhāya vā mattikāya vā”ti etena ṭhapetvā ime dve lepe avaseso bhasmāgomayādibhedo alepoti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1067_0: Yasmā pana saññācikāya kuṭiṃ karontenāpi idha vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1067_1: tasmā “sayaṃ vā karontena āṇattiyā vā kārāpentenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1067_2: Ettha ca “sayaṃ vā karontenā”ti iminā sāmatthiyato labbhamānamatthamāha,
tika-vin09t:1067_5: Evañca katvā yadi pana “karontena vā kārāpentena vā”ti vadeyya,
tika-vin09t:1067_7: Na hi kārāpento karonto nāma hotīti edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1067_11: Anissaratā cettha kārāpanenāti āha “kāretā dāyakena virahita”nti.
tika-vin09t:1068_10: “Tiriyaṃ sattantarā”ti ukkaṃsato pamāṇassa vuttattā “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā catuhatthavitthārā na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1069_1: Padabhājane vuttanayena saṅghaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācitvāti “saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin09t:1069_2: vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo ‘ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t:1069_3: saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t:1069_4: saṅghaṃ kuṭivatthuolokanaṃ yācāmī”’ti padabhājane vuttanayena tikkhattuṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin09t:1069_5: Saṅghena vā sammatāti padabhājaniyaṃ vuttena ñattidutiyakammena,
tika-vin09t:1070_0: Kipillikādīnanti ettha kipillikā nāma rattakāḷapiṅgalādibhedā yā kāci,
tika-vin09t:1070_1: tā ādi yesaṃ tāni kipillikādīni, tesaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1070_4: so ādi yesaṃ te āsayādayo, tehi.
tika-vin09t:1070_7: upacikānaṃ vā undūrānaṃ vā ahīnaṃ vā vicchikānaṃ vā satapadīnaṃ vā hatthīnaṃ vā assānaṃ vā sīhānaṃ vā
tika-vin09t:1070_8: byagghānaṃ vā dīpīnaṃ vā acchānaṃ vā taracchānaṃ vā yesaṃ kesañci tiracchānagatānaṃ pāṇānaṃ vā āsayo hoti,
tika-vin09t:1070_11: vā hotī”ti evaṃ vuttehi soḷasahi upaddavehi.
tika-vin09t:1071_2: Yācitehīti “ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo ‘ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t:1071_3: saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t:1072_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1072_7: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1072_10: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthussa desanā,
tika-vin09t:1073_4: Lepe ghaṭiteti antolepe vā antolepena saddhiṃ bhittiñca chadanañca ekābaddhaṃ katvā ghaṭite,
tika-vin09t:1073_7: Ubhayavipannāti ubhayehi desanāpamāṇehi vipannā virahitā ubhayavipannā,
tika-vin09t:1073_10: Lepo na ghaṭiyatīti pubbe dinnalepo dvārabandhena vā vātapānena vā saddhiṃ na ghaṭiyati,
tika-vin09t:1073_11: ekābaddhaṃ hutvā na tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1073_12: Tanti dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā parāmasati.
tika-vin09t:1073_13: Paṭhamamevāti lepakiccassa niṭṭhitattā dvārabandhavātapānānaṃ ṭhapanato pubbeyeva,
tika-vin09t:1073_15: “Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1073_17: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1073_18: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti padabhājaniyaṃ vuttattā “kevalaṃ sārambhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1073_20: Aññassa dadato cāti aññassa puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā dadato ca.
tika-vin09t:1073_21: Guhā nāma iṭṭhakaguhā vā silāguhā vā dāruguhā vā bhūmiguhā vā.
tika-vin09t:1073_22: Tiṇakuṭi nāma sattabhūmikopi pāsādo tiṇacchadano “tiṇakuṭikā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin09t:1073_23: Aññassāti ācariyassa vā upajjhāyassa vā saṅghassa vā.
tika-vin09t:1073_24: Vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvāti attano vasanatthāya vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin09t:1076_3: so tassa atthīti āha “mahantabhāvo etassa atthīti mahallako”ti.
tika-vin09t:1076_7: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko vuccatī”ti ettakameva padabhājane vuttanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1076_9: Mātikāyaṃ bhikkhū vā anabhineyyāti ettha vā-
tika-vin09t:1076_10: saddo “ayaṃ vā so mahānāgo”tiādīsu viya avadhāraṇattho.
tika-vin09t:1077_1: Tassa kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇiādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
tika-vin09t:1077_3: “Kusumbassa nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattā”ti eke.
tika-vin09t:1077_4: Channattheraṃ ārabbhāti yo abhinikkhamanakāle saddhiṃ nikkhanto,
tika-vin09t:1077_5: yassa ca satthārā parinibbānakāle brahmadaṇḍo āṇatto,
tika-vin09t:1077_10: Vatthuno adesanāya āpajjanato “akiriyamattato samuṭṭhānabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ. Matta-
tika-vin09t:1077_13: kuṭikaraṇena ca samuṭṭhānato kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhātī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t:1080_3: Idāni “dūsito ceva dūsako cā”ti iminā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “uppanne hi dose”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1080_6: Ākāranānāttenāti dūsitākārassa ceva dūsakākārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ nānābhāvena.
tika-vin09t:1080_10: so tehi vajjito nāma hotīti āha “pītisukhādīhi vivajjito”ti.
tika-vin09t:1080_12: na so tehi abhisaṭo nāma hotīti āha “na abhisaṭo”ti,
tika-vin09t:1080_15: Taṃ pana amūlakattaṃ yasmā codakavasena adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1081_0: Idāni attanā vuttameva diṭṭhādiṃ vivarituṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1081_1: Tathevāti “pasādasotena vā dibbasotena vā”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin09t:1081_5: Tattha bhikkhuñca mātugāmañca tathārūpe ṭhāne disvā “addhā imehi kata”nti vā “karissantī”ti vā parisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1081_7: Andhakāre vā paṭicchannokāse vā bhikkhussa ca mātugāmassa ca vacanaṃ sutvā dutiyassa atthibhāvaṃ ajānato pubbe vuttanayena parisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1081_9: Dhuttehi itthīhi saddhiṃ paccantavihāre maṇḍape vā sālādīsu vā pupphagandhamaṃsasurādīni anubhavitvā
tika-vin09t:1081_10: gataṭṭhānaṃ disvā “kena nu kho idaṃ kata”nti vīmaṃsantena tatra kenaci bhikkhunā gandhādīhi pūjā katā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1081_12: so tassa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā “ayaṃ so bhavissatī”ti parisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1081_16: Tañca panetaṃ diṭṭhādikaṃ na kevalaṃ attano vāti āha “attano vā parassa vā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1081_19: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā padabhājane “pārājikena dhammenāti catunnaṃ aññatarenā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1081_23: “Tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”tiādinā nayena pavattāti “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi,
tika-vin09t:1081_27: Ettha ca “assamaṇosī’ti avandanakāraṇassa avuttattā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno na vanditabbo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:1081_28: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ avandiyesu antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa avuttattā,
tika-vin09t:1081_29: “pacchā upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo”ti vuttattā ca.
tika-vin09t:1081_30: Idaṃ pana attanā vattabbaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1082_1: Sikkhāpaccakkhānameva hi hatthamuddāya sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t:1082_5: Brahmacariyāti brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ pasatthaṃ cariyanti brahmacariyaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1082_11: “Tajjanīyakammādisattavidhampi kammaṃ karissāmā”ti āpattiyā codentassa adhippāyo kammādhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:1082_15: Anuvijjakenāti saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinituṃ nisinnena vinayadharena.
tika-vin09t:1082_16: Kiṃ te diṭṭhanti tayā kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1082_18: dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjanto diṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1082_21: kattha te diṭṭha”nti imaṃ nayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t:1083_1: Yathā hi samanavasena samathānaṃ vivādādīsu adhikatabhāvo,
tika-vin09t:1083_5: Adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti catubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1083_12: Adhikaraṇaṃ samenti vūpasamentītipi samathāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:1083_13: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sesādhikaraṇehi codanāya abhāvato “idaṃ pana pārājikasaṅkhātaṃ āpattādhikaraṇameva adhippeta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1084_5: samayena āvajjitvā ñāte pana ñātameva hoti.
tika-vin09t:1084_9: Yasmā pana parammukhā sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadato dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin09t:1084_10: tasmā “parammukhā codentassa pana sīsaṃ na etī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1084_13: Vadantassāti sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi upasampannaṃ sammukhā vadantassa.
tika-vin09t:1084_15: Okāsaṃ kāretvā upasampannaṃ sammukhā vadantassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyanti āha “okāsaṃ kāretvā vadantassa pācittiyamevā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1085_0: Uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapentassa ca okāsakammaṃ natthīti ettha uposathato pure vā pacchā vā ṭhapitopi aṭṭhapito hoti.
tika-vin09t:1085_5: saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti ettha yāva re-
tika-vin09t:1085_9: kāre pana vutte ṭhapentena pacchā ṭhapito nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t:1085_10: “Suṇātu me”ti anāraddhe ṭhapentena pure ṭhapito hoti.
tika-vin09t:1085_18: etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā hoti pavāraṇā. Yya-
tika-vin09t:1085_20: tasmā tato paṭṭhāya ṭhapentena aṭṭhapitā hoti.
tika-vin09t:1085_23: tatiyampi bhante saṅghaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā…pe…
tika-vin09t:1085_25: kārato yāva ayaṃ sabbapacchimo ṭi- kāro,
tika-vin09t:1085_27: etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā hoti pavāraṇā.
tika-vin09t:1085_29: tasmā “karissāmī”ti etasmiṃ pade sampatte ṭhapitāpi aṭṭhapitā hoti.
tika-vin09t:1085_34: Osaṭe vatthusminti codakena attanā vattabbe saṅghamajjhe udāhaṭe.
tika-vin09t:1088_2: tassa jātiādito aññassa tiracchānajātiādikoṭṭhāsassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1088_7: Aññabhāgo vāti tiracchānajātiādibhedo añño koṭṭhāso vā.
tika-vin09t:1088_12: Ṭhapetvā pana tiracchānajātiādikaṃ paramatthato visuṃ chagalakādike asatipi “paṭimāya sarīra”ntiādīsu
tika-vin09t:1088_14: aññabhāgo vā assa atthī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1089_0: Idāni “aññabhāgassa ida”ntiādinā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ kevalaṃ nayadassanatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgatameva gahetvā vibhajanto “yo hi so”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1089_1: Tena nanu anāgate evaṃ codentānaṃ pāpabhikkhūnaṃ lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1089_5: Na pana “yo hi so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ dabbo mallaputto”tiādinā visesenāti edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1089_16: chagalakabhāvassa cāti “tiracchānajātiyā ceva chagalakabhāvassa cā”ti saṅkhātassa aññassa bhāgassa koṭṭhāsassa,
tika-vin09t:1090_2: Tattha manussajāti ceva bhikkhubhāvo cāti yo ayaṃ bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkhoti sambandho,
tika-vin09t:1090_3: “manussajāti ceva bhikkhubhāvo cā”ti saṅkhāto yo ayaṃ bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkhoti attho.
tika-vin09t:1090_5: So vā aññabhāgoti yathāvuttatiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhāto so aññabhāgo vā.
tika-vin09t:1090_9: yasmā ca so vā aññabhāgo assa atthi, tasmā.
tika-vin09t:1090_10: Aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ labhatīti ettha “so yvāya”nti idha so-
tika-vin09t:1090_11: saddameva ānetvā so aññabhāgiyasaṅkhaṃ labhatīti yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1090_17: Imaṃ mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomāti chagalakaṃ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ disvā “mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin09t:1090_18: imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1090_20: Etthāpi “yo so”tiādikaṃ ānetvā tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya yo so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto,
tika-vin09t:1090_21: so yasmā ādhāro vatthu adhiṭṭhānanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1091_0: Idāni kathametaṃ viññāyati “adhikaraṇa”nti cettha ādhāro veditabbo,
tika-vin09t:1091_1: na vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataranti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “tañhi sandhāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1091_2: Tattha tanti tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ paccāmasati.
tika-vin09t:1091_3: Vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ sandhāya na vuttanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t:1091_6: Idāni tameva asambhavaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1091_10: yenevaṃ vuttanti āha “na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t:1094_0: Āpattileso nāma lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho hoti.
tika-vin09t:1094_3: āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅghādisesassāti evaṃ āpattilesampi puggalasmiṃyeva āropetvā vuttattā “puggalānaṃyeva lesā vuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1094_4: Tañca “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmanti mettiyabhūmajakehi chagalakassa kataṃ taṃ “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmañca.
tika-vin09t:1094_5: Evaṃ asambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni imināva pasaṅgena desalesasaddānaṃ atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1094_14: “Īsakaṃ allīyatī”ti iminā “leso”ti lisa allībhāveti imassa rūpanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1094_15: Kiñcāpi desalesānaṃ vuttanayena byañjanato nānākaraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin09t:1094_16: atthato pana natthīti āha “jātiādīnaṃyeva aññatarakoṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-vin09t:1095_0: Yadi pana nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhārabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ sandhāya “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1095_1: atha kasmā padabhājane taṃ avibhajitvā “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vā hoti adhikaraṇaññabhāgiyaṃ
tika-vin09t:1095_6: Nanu ca “atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantī”ti na ekena saddena anekatthā abhidhīyantīti?
tika-vin09t:1095_8: tesaṃ tesaṃ pana atthānaṃ adhikaraṇasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññaṃ upādāya vuccamāno ayaṃ vicāro adhikaraṇasaddassa atthuddhāroti vutto.
tika-vin09t:1095_9: Tenevāha “adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti.
tika-vin09t:1095_13: Avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyena codanañcāti “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t:1095_16: Ekamekañhi adhikaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ aññapakkhiyaṃ aññakoṭṭhāsiyaṃ hoti vatthuvisabhāgattā.
tika-vin09t:1095_17: Ādisaddena “kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ adhikaraṇassa aññabhāgiya”ntiādiko padavibhāgo saṅgahito.
tika-vin09t:1096_0: Kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1096_1: tassāpi asambhavadassanappasaṅgena heṭṭhā vuttattā “sesā vinicchayakathā aṭṭhame vuttasadisāyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1096_2: Tattha sesā vinicchayakathāti “pārājikenāti bhikkhuno anurūpesu ekūnavisatiyā aññatarenā”tiādikā vinicchayakathā.
tika-vin09t:1096_3: Vuttasadisāyevāti ettha imasmiṃ sikkhāpade yā vattabbā,
tika-vin09t:1096_4: tena sikkhāpadena sādhāraṇabhūtā sā vuttasadisāyevāti adhippetā,
tika-vin09t:1096_7: Purimasmiṃ sikkhāpadepi tathāsaññino anāpattikattā “idha cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1096_10: Tena kenaci bhikkhunā añño koci khattiyajātiko pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t:1096_11: atha so aññaṃ attano veriṃ khattiyajātikaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā taṃ khattiyajātilesaṃ gahetvā evaṃ codeti
tika-vin09t:1096_14: atha vā tvaṃ kho khattiyo, na añño,
tika-vin09t:1096_18: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti,
tika-vin09t:1096_20: Ettha ca tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asadisassa tassa tassa dīghādino vā diṭṭhādino vā vasena aññabhāgiyatā,
tika-vin09t:1097_0: Āpattilese pana kenaci bhikkhunā koci bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t:1097_3: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotīti?
tika-vin09t:1097_6: tassa pana aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa leso nāma.
tika-vin09t:1097_7: Yo so sabbakhattiyānaṃ sādhāraṇo khattiyabhāvo viya sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇo āpattibhāvo.
tika-vin09t:1097_8: Eteneva upāyena “kenaci bhikkhunā koci bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t:1102_1: Tenāha “cittena ca sarīrena ca aviyuttassāti attho”ti.
tika-vin09t:1102_3: Samānasaṃvāsakoti samāno ekūposathādibhedo saṃvāso assāti samānasaṃvāsako,
tika-vin09t:1102_7: tesu tesu saṅghakammesu hatthapāsūpagamanatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1102_8: Kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ bhijjeyyāti ayaṃ saṅgho kena nu kho upāyena vaggo bhaveyya.
tika-vin09t:1103_4: Abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti,
tika-vin09t:1103_5: bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti.
tika-vin09t:1104_0: Evaṃ kammakkhandhake vuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ bhedakaraṇānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1104_1: Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya phalaṃ ettha vasatīti “vatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin09t:1109_4: tiṭṭhatā ca taṃ dīpitañceva avinissaṭṭhañca hoti,
tika-vin09t:1109_6: Kīva dūre sutvā gantvā avadantānaṃ dukkaṭanti āha “sabbantimena paricchedenā”tiādi. Pi-
tika-vin09t:1109_9: Tattha “aḍḍhayojanamatta”nti iminā ekavihāre vattabbameva natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin09t:1109_10: “Gantvā”ti iminā dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā pesetvā vadatopi āpattimokkho natthi,
tika-vin09t:1110_1: Ekībhāvo ca samānaladdhivasena hotīti āha “ekaladdhiko hotū”ti.
tika-vin09t:1110_7: bahisīmāyaṃ vā anupariveṇiyaṃ vāti na ekuddeso.
tika-vin09t:1110_9: Appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭanti visuṃ visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1110_12: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkamatī”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāhi ñatticatutthāhi
tika-vin09t:1110_13: tīhi samanubhāsanakammavācāhi kammaṃ kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1110_14: “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa adhikaraṇassa samādāya paggaṇhanato pubbepi
tika-vin09t:1110_15: pakkhapariyesanādivasena saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1111_3: dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā ca paṭippassambhantīti āha “samanubhāsanakamme”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1111_4: Tañca dukkaṭaṃ te ca thullaccayā paṭippassambhantīti yañca ñattipariyosāne dukkaṭaṃ āpanno,
tika-vin09t:1111_6: tā tissopi āpattiyo liṅgaparivattena asādhāraṇāpattiyo viya paṭippassambhanti.
tika-vin09t:1111_12: bhedāya parakkamati ceva bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭhati ca,
tika-vin09t:1111_17: Paṭinissajjantassāpi ñattito pubbe vā ñattikkhaṇe vā ñattipariyosāne vā paṭhamāya vā anussāvanāya dutiyāya vā tatiyāya vā yāva yya-
tika-vin09t:1112_0: Ettha pana “devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami,
tika-vin09t:1112_1: tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā devadatto ādikammiko,
tika-vin09t:1112_4: Na hi tassa taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin09t:1112_6: Tathā hi “ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajji,
tika-vin09t:1112_7: tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā ariṭṭhassa kammaṃ katanti paññāyati,
tika-vin09t:1112_9: Athāpissa katena bhavitabbanti koci attano rucimattena vadeyya,
tika-vin09t:1112_10: tathāpi appaṭinissajjane ādikammikassa anāpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t:1112_11: Na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassa aññatra odissa anuññātato anāpatti nāma dissati.
tika-vin09t:1112_12: Yampi ariṭṭhasikkhāpadassa padabhājane anāpattiyaṃ “ādikammikassā”ti potthakesu likhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1112_14: pamādalikhitabhāvo ca tassa “paṭhamaṃ ariṭṭho bhikkhu codetabbo,
tika-vin09t:1112_16: sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo”ti evaṃ kammakkhandhake āpattiropanato veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:1113_0: Idha bhedāya parakkamane ādikammikassa devadattassa yasmā taṃ kammaṃ na kataṃ,
tika-vin09t:1113_2: Sikkhāpadaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha paññattanti katvā “ādikammiko”ti vutto.
tika-vin09t:1113_5: Yasmā pana asamanubhāsiyamāno nāma yassa kevalaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ na karonti,
tika-vin09t:1113_10: Eteneva upāyena ṭhapetvā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ sabbasamanubhāsanāsu vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:1113_12: “Paṭinissajjāmī”ti kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato akiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1116_3: Yaṃ vacanaṃ samaggepi vagge avayavabhūte karoti bhindati,
tika-vin09t:1116_4: taṃ kalahakārakavacanaṃ idha “vagga”nti vuccatīti āha “vaggaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-vin09t:1116_9: “Na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti idaṃ niggahavasena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1116_13: Jānāti noti etthāpi “chandañca ruciñcā”ti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1116_17: “Eta”nti iminā tassa kammaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha “yaṃ so karotī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1119_0: Dukkhena vattabbo anusāsituṃ asakkuṇeyyo sabhāvo assāti dubbacajātiko,
tika-vin09t:1119_3: Vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti kismiñci vuccamāne asahanato ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
tika-vin09t:1119_9: Atha sabbāneva sikkhāpadāni kathaṃ pātimokkhuddesapariyāpannānīti āha “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin09t:1119_11: “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti iminā sabbāpi āpattiyo nidānuddese saṅgahitā eva honti.
tika-vin09t:1119_13: So pana pākaṭoyevāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na vutto.
tika-vin09t:1119_16: Tathā hi tehi yathāsakaṃ sikkhā sikkhīyati, na sabbā.
tika-vin09t:1119_19: Atha vā sahadhammikena sakāraṇena vuccamānoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:1119_20: Vacanāyāti nissakke sampadānavacananti āha “tato mama vacanato”ti.
tika-vin09t:1122_0: Nagarassāpi gāmavisesattā idha gāmaggahaṇeneva nagarampi gahitanti āha “nagarampi gāme antogadhamevā”ti, vā-
tika-vin09t:1122_1: saddena vā anuttavikappatthena gahaṇanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1122_4: taṃtaṃviparīto gāmoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:1122_5: Kulāni dūsetīti khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddavasena cattāri kulāni vikāraṃ āpādeti.
tika-vin09t:1122_7: atha kho attano duppaṭipattiyā tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin09t:1122_9: Tattha haritvā vā harāpetvā vā pakkositvā vā pakkosāpetvā vā sayaṃ vā upagatānaṃ yassa kassaci attano
tika-vin09t:1122_14: Saddhaṃ vināsentoti tathā akarontesu aññesu pesalesu bhikkhūsu appasādaṃ adassanaṃ gamento.
tika-vin09t:1122_15: Pupphadānādīhi ca tehi katasaṅgahehi aññe pesale tathā akaronte te manussā issanti na allīyantīti so tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1122_17: Te pana yasmā kulasaṅgahatthaṃ mālāvaccharopanādayo idha adhippetā,
tika-vin09t:1123_5: Alaṃ te idha vāsenāti tava idha vāsena alaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1123_6: mā idha tava vāso hotūti attho.
tika-vin09t:1123_8: Pabbājanīyakammakatoti codetvā sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetvā “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin09t:1123_9: ime assajipunabbasukā”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāya ñatticatutthakammavācāya katapabbājanīyakammo.
tika-vin09t:1123_12: carituṃ labhatīti sacepi gāmo vā nigamo vā dvādasayojanaparamo hoti,
tika-vin09t:1123_14: neva tasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā piṇḍāya carituṃ labhati,
tika-vin09t:1123_16: Tasmiṃ vihāre vasantena sāmantagāmepi piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1123_17: sāmantavihārepi vasantena tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1123_18: Sāmantavihāre vasantena pana sāmantagāme carituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1123_19: Āpajjitabbā āpattiyoti kulasaṅgahatthaṃ attano santakadāne dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1126_0: Paṭhamāpattikāti avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsatthoti āha “paṭhamaṃ āpatti etesanti paṭhamāpattikā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1127_2: Nāmamattavasena vā ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattīti “ayaṃ saṅghādiseso nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ vinā vatthuṃ nāmavasena vā.
tika-vin09t:1127_5: taṃ na sundaraṃ “ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:1127_6: Idāni naṃ kassaci na ārocessāmīti sambandho.
tika-vin09t:1127_8: Na kevalaṃ vatthunāmavaseneva āpattisaññī hutvā chādentasseva,
tika-vin09t:1127_9: atha kho yopi evaṃ ajānanto kevalaṃ “āpattiṃ chādemī”ti āpattisaññāya chādeti,
tika-vin09t:1127_12: aññāpattikkhandhasaññī vā vematiko vā hutvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti evaṃ chādetukāmova dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin09t:1127_14: Anāpatti pana āpattisaññāyapi anāpattisaññāyapi chādentena acchāditāva hoti.
tika-vin09t:1128_3: Vuttanayenevāti “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”tiādinā vuttaneva nayena.
tika-vin09t:1128_4: Atha “mayhaṃ saṅghena kammaṃ kata”nti apakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin09t:1128_6: Apakatattena pana pakatattasaññinā vā pakatattena apakatattasaññinā vā chāditāpi acchannāva hoti.
tika-vin09t:1131_0: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ;
tika-vin09t:1134_2: Sace pana yo bhīrukajātikatāya andhakāre amanussacaṇḍamigabhayena antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin09t:1134_4: Yassapi pabbatavihāre vasantassa kandaraṃ vā nadiṃ vā atikkamitvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1134_8: etasmiṃ satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin09t:1134_10: Antarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya vā anantarāyikasaññāya vā chādayato acchannāva.
tika-vin09t:1135_1: Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1135_5: tāvatakena pana neva vattuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t:1135_10: Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena pahusaññinā vā appahusaññinā vā chāditāpi acchāditāva.
tika-vin09t:1136_1: Sace pana “chādessāmī”ti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamati,
tika-vin09t:1137_0: Yassa pana abhikkhuke ṭhāne vasantassa āpattiṃ āpajjitvā sabhāgassa bhikkhuno āgamanaṃ āgamentassa vā,
tika-vin09t:1137_1: sabhāgassa santikaṃ vā gacchantassa aḍḍhamāsopi māsopi atikkamati,
tika-vin09t:1138_0: Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā apakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āvi karoti,
tika-vin09t:1138_4: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo,
tika-vin09t:1138_7: pacchābhattaṃ vā divā vā rattiṃ vā,
tika-vin09t:1139_0: Akāmā parivatthabbanti appaṭikammakatāya āpattiyā saggamokkhāvaraṇabhāvato anicchantenāpi parivasitabbanti attho.
tika-vin09t:1139_7: tathāpi appaṭicchannaparivāso idha na adhippetoti āha “tattha paṭicchanna…pe…
tika-vin09t:1139_10: Paṭicchannāya āpattiyā sati dātabbo parivāso paṭicchannavisayatāya paṭicchannaparivāso.
tika-vin09t:1140_0: Idāni te tividheyeva parivāse sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1140_5: iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya ādiattho.
tika-vin09t:1140_7: saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavisaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t:1140_8: Evaṃ parivāsaṃ yācāpetvāti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā.
tika-vin09t:1140_14: Māsappaṭicchannanti sattānaṃ āyuṃ minanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti māso,
tika-vin09t:1140_18: dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya sarati pavattatīti saṃvaccharo,
tika-vin09t:1141_0: Vatthukittanavasena vāti nāmena saha vatthukittanavasena vāti attho.
tika-vin09t:1141_1: Teneva hi upari “nāmamattavasena vā”ti mattaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1141_2: Nāmamattavasenāti vatthukittanaṃ vinā kevalaṃ nāmasseva vasena.
tika-vin09t:1141_3: Tasmāti yasmā duvidhe nāme “āpattī”ti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin09t:1141_7: Vatthu ceva gottañcāti vītikkamattā vatthu ceva anaññasādhāraṇattā gottañca.
tika-vin09t:1141_9: sajātito aññattha kāyasaṃsaggādīsu gantuṃ adatvā buddhiṃ,
tika-vin09t:1141_14: sajātisādhāraṇanāmattā nāmañceva tena tena vītikkamenāpajjitabbattā āpatti cāti attho.
tika-vin09t:1142_0: Tayidaṃ kammavācāya kena vacanena gahitanti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1142_2: vītikkamena āpajjitabbattā ca nāmañceva āpatti ca hotīti āha “āpattiyoti vacanenāpī”ti.
tika-vin09t:1142_9: Vattaṃ samādātabbanti yathāvuttesu dvīsu padesu ekenapi samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1144_1: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1144_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin09t:1144_3: tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin09t:1145_1: Imañca panatthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t:1145_2: “Puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentenā”ti idaṃ āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1145_3: Ettha ca ekassa ārocentena avasāne “vedayatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretu”,
tika-vin09t:1145_8: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabbaṃ pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccupaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pārivāsikakkhandhake yāni catunavuti vattāni vuttāni,
tika-vin09t:1145_11: pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā sahavāso vippavāso anārocanā”ti ratticchedo vutto,
tika-vin09t:1146_1: sace āgantukā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā vā avissamitvā eva vā vihāramajjhena gacchanti,
tika-vin09t:1146_8: Yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchanti,
tika-vin09t:1146_9: ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvāva āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin09t:1147_0: Nadiādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu dūre ṭhitampi
tika-vin09t:1147_3: mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1147_5: Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t:1148_0: Aññaṃ kañci vihāraṃ gatenapi bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbameva.
tika-vin09t:1148_3: Atha rukkhamūlādīsu visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitā honti,
tika-vin09t:1148_10: Sañcicca anārocentassa pana ratticchedo ceva hoti,
tika-vin09t:1149_1: Māḷakato pana bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1149_2: Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena saha gacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1149_8: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyanasaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1149_10: Gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1149_11: Vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbanti vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā parivāso ārocetabbo.
tika-vin09t:1149_17: Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
tika-vin09t:1149_24: Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati,
tika-vin09t:1149_28: Yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhunti vihārato nikkhamantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā sabbapaṭhamaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati.
tika-vin09t:1149_29: Tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti anārocentassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā,
tika-vin09t:1149_33: Yāva rattiyo pūrentīti yattakā rattiyo āpatti paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1149_36: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana “evaṃ yattakāni divasāni āpatti paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1149_38: tato adhikatarāni vā kukkuccavinodanatthāya parivasitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1150_3: Cūḷasuddhanto mahāsuddhantoti ettha yo upasampadato paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t:1150_4: paṭilomakkamena vā “asukañca asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t:1150_6: ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t:1151_0: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin09t:1151_1: tattakaṃ apanetvā avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1151_3: parivasanto ca puna aññaṃ māsaṃ sarati,
tika-vin09t:1152_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomappaṭilomavasena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti nassarati,
tika-vin09t:1152_7: Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti “māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassā”ti,
tika-vin09t:1152_9: Ettha ca kiñcāpi “ettakaṃ kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadantassa cūḷasuddhanto dīyati,
tika-vin09t:1152_12: Tassa dānavidhi khandhake āgatoti tassa duvidhassāpi suddhantassa dānavidhi “tena,
tika-vin09t:1152_17: Esa nayo vinicchayakathā pana vitthārato samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttāti etthāpi.
tika-vin09t:1153_3: Idāni taṃ tividhampi samodhānaparivāsaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1153_4: Antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassāti yo parivāsaṃ gahetvā anikkhittavatto hutvā parivasanto apariniṭṭhiteyeva
tika-vin09t:1153_5: parivāse antarā vemajjhe saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti, tassa.
tika-vin09t:1153_8: Makkhetvāti ñatticatutthena kammena mūlāya paṭikassanavasena makkhetvā.
tika-vin09t:1153_14: yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho
tika-vin09t:1153_15: vā anikkhittavatto aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā purimāpattiyā samā vā ūnatarā vā rattiyo paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin09t:1153_16: tassa mūlāya paṭikassanena te parivutthadivase ca mānattaciṇṇadivase ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā
tika-vin09t:1153_17: pacchā āpannāpattiṃ mūlāpattiyaṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabboti.
tika-vin09t:1154_0: Sace pana antarāpatti mūlāpattito atirekappaṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1154_1: taṃ mūlāpattiṃ katvā tattha itaraṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin09t:1154_3: mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā pubbe gahitaparivāseneva parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1155_1: sabbacirappaṭicchannāyoti yā ekā vā āpatti sabbacirappaṭicchannā,
tika-vin09t:1155_2: yā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyoti attho.
tika-vin09t:1156_2: aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannāti evaṃ dasakkhattuṃ katvā āpattisahassaṃ divasasatapaṭicchannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1156_5: Evaṃ ekeneva dasāhena divasasatampi parivasitameva hoti.
tika-vin09t:1160_0: Idāni missakasamodhānaṃ niddisituṃ “missakasamodhāno nāmā”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ nayo –
tika-vin09t:1161_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin09t:1162_0: Tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin09t:1162_1: Ettha ca “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”ntipi evaṃ
tika-vin09t:1162_2: pubbe vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi yojetvā kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭhatiyevāti.
tika-vin09t:1162_6: vinicchayādīnaṃ vā anāmaṭṭhattā “ayaṃ tividhepi samodhānaparivāse saṅkhepakathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1162_7: Mahāvisayattā samodhānavicāraṇāya sā niravasesā kuto laddhabbāti āha “vitthāro”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1163_0: Chārattanti rā saddo tīyati chijjati etthāti ratti,
tika-vin09t:1163_5: avayavabyatirekena samudāyassābhāvato cha rattiyoti attho vutto.
tika-vin09t:1164_0: Parivāsaṃ adatvā mānattameva dātabbanti yasmā āpatti appaṭicchannā,
tika-vin09t:1164_2: tasmā parivāsaṃ adatvā kevalaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1164_4: idaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāmāti āha “yassa paṭicchannā hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1164_7: Kathaṃ pana tesaṃ dvinnaṃ mānattānaṃ dānavidhi ca vinicchayakathā ca veditabbāti āha “ubhinnampi panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1165_1: Parivāse vuttappakāraṃ padesanti parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin09t:1165_2: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1166_1: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t:1166_2: saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin09t:1166_3: tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin09t:1167_1: Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t:1167_2: Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ca ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye gantumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1167_3: Aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1167_4: Sace sopi kenaci kammena pure aruṇeyeva gacchati,
tika-vin09t:1167_5: aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
tika-vin09t:1167_9: tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hoti.
tika-vin09t:1167_13: Tenāha “tato tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayena paṭipajjitabba”nti.
tika-vin09t:1168_0: Yattha siyāti yassaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyaṃ vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi.
tika-vin09t:1168_7: pakatattassa ca abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t:1168_10: Tenāpi vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1168_12: So hi chārattātikkameneva abbhānāraho hotī”tiādinā vinicchayavasena.
tika-vin09t:1168_13: Taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ parivāsādikammaṃ pāḷivasena ca aṭṭhakathāvasena ca suviññeyyattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha,
tika-vin09t:1168_15: Imassa pana kammassa vīsativaggakaraṇīyattā tato ūnatarena kataṃ kuppati.
tika-vin09t:1174_0: “Mātugāmenā”ti vatvā puna “ekāyā”ti vuttattā “mātugāmasaṅkhātāya ekāya itthiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1174_6: Cakkhussa raho nāma na sakkā hoti akkhiṃ vā nikhaṇiyamāne,
tika-vin09t:1174_9: Sotassa raho nāma na sakkā hoti pakatikathā sotu”nti padabhājanapāḷiyaṃ sotassa rahoti āgataṃ,
tika-vin09t:1174_10: atha kasmā taṃ avatvā “cakkhussa raho”ti ettakameva vuttanti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1174_11: Iminā pāḷiyaṃ “sotassa raho”ti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1174_12: Atha kathametaṃ viññāyati “cakkhusseva raho idha adhippeto”ti?
tika-vin09t:1174_13: “Paṭicchanne āsane”ti vacanato “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti ca vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:1174_16: Apihitakavāṭassa pana dvāre nisinno anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:1174_17: na kevalaṃ apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinnova anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:1174_20: Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto kapimiddhapareto kañci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti,
tika-vin09t:1174_24: Nipajjitvā niddāyanto pana tādiso na hotīti āha “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi na karotī”ti,
tika-vin09t:1174_28: Teneva vesāliyaṃ mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanne bhikkhumhi sambahulā itthiyo yāvadatthaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
tika-vin09t:1174_32: tasmā nipajjanampi antokatvā “nisajjaṃ kappeyyā”ti vuttanti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1174_33: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabboti nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānassa tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarasamāyogo hotiyevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1174_35: pana saṅghādisesena ca pācittiyena ca tenākārena nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabbo.
tika-vin09t:1174_36: Na appaṭijānamānoti nisajjaṃ appaṭijānamāno tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena na kāretabboti.
tika-vin09t:1174_39: tāva “neva suddho”ti vā “na asuddho”ti vā vattabbo,
tika-vin09t:1175_0: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin09t:1177_0: Na kevalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena codanāyameva evaṃ paṭiññāya kāretabbo,
tika-vin09t:1177_1: atha kho nisajjādinā ākārena saddhiṃ codanāyapīti dassetuṃ “yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya,
tika-vin09t:1177_4: Ettha ca “paṭijānamāno”ti avuttepi adhikārattā “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1177_5: Tathārūpāya upāsikāya vacane aññathattābhāvato diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti,
tika-vin09t:1178_0: Rahonisajjassādena mātugāmassa santikaṃ gantukāmo akkhiṃ añjeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1178_9: Ettha ca rahonisajjassādassa asatipi methunarāgabhāve tappaṭibaddhakilesattā vuttaṃ “methunadhammasannissitakilesasaṅkhātenā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1178_11: Rahassādenāti “itthannāmāya saddhiṃ raho nisīditvā hasitalapitādikaṃ kareyya”nti uppannaassādahetu.
tika-vin09t:1178_12: Nisajjāya pācittiyaṃ asati upacāragate nipajjitvā aniddāyante anandhe viññupuriseti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t:1178_13: Sace sā itthī kenaci karaṇīyena uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdati,
tika-vin09t:1178_23: Aniyametvā “diṭṭhadiṭṭhāya saddhiṃ rahassādaṃ kappissāmī”ti gantvā nisinnassāpi āgatāgatānaṃ vasena,
tika-vin09t:1178_24: punappunaṃ nisajjāya vasena ca vuttanayeneva āpattiyo veditabbā.
tika-vin09t:1178_27: Sace suddhacittena gantvā nisinnassa santikaṃ āgantvā nisinnāya itthiyā rahassādo uppajjati,
tika-vin09t:1181_0: Naheva kho pana paṭicchannanti ettha pana yampi bahi parikkhittaṃ anto vivaṭaṃ pariveṇaṅgaṇādi,
tika-vin09t:1181_4: Teneva hi padabhājane “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo,
tika-vin09t:1181_5: mayā diṭṭho nisinno mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto”’tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1181_7: Duṭṭhullavācañca sutvā taṃ mātugāmopi na paṭicchādeti.
tika-vin09t:1181_8: Tathā hi duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā,
tika-vin09t:1181_10: tasmā idha itthīpi anāpattiṃ karotīti āha “itthīpī”ti.
tika-vin09t:1181_11: Atha vā idha appaṭicchannattā itthīpi anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:1181_12: paṭhame pana paṭicchannattā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:1181_13: Anandho abadhiroti ettha kāyasaṃsaggavasena anandho vutto,
tika-vin09t:1182_10: Ettha ca kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto duṭṭhullampi bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t:1182_11: duṭṭhullaṃ bhaṇanto nisīdati cāti “kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1184_0: “Aniyatuddeso cāyaṃ diṭṭhādisamūlakacodanāya vatthuṃ paṭijānamānova āpattiyā kāretabbo,
tika-vin09t:1191_3: Yasmā pana taṃ cīvaraṃ karaṇenapi niṭṭhitaṃ hoti nāsanādīhipi,
tika-vin09t:1191_5: Tattha yaṃ kiñci sūciyā kattabbaṃ pāsakapaṭṭagaṇṭhikapaṭṭapariyosānakammaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1191_11: Cīvarāsā vā upacchinnāti “asukasmiṃ nāma kule cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti yā cīvarāsā uppannā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1191_18: Pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhanaṭṭhena kathinaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1191_23: Tāva kathinānisaṃsaṃ labhatīti ettha yo atthatakathino bhikkhūti ajjhāharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1191_26: “Atthatakathinassa bhikkhuno”ti idaṃ vā “atthatakathino bhikkhū”ti vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1191_29: Tesu ekapalibodhepi sati yasmā anāmantacārādikaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ labhati, nāsati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t:1191_30: “Niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti etassa cīvarassa karaṇapalibodhe upacchinneti ayamattho viññāyatīti.
tika-vin09t:1192_4: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu”nti kathinakkhandhake bhagavatā kathinassa anuññātattā “ayañhi kathinatthāro nāma…pe…
tika-vin09t:1192_6: Tattha purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānanti vassacchedaṃ akatvā purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānanti attho.
tika-vin09t:1192_7: Etena vuṭṭhavassavasena tāva purimikāya vassaṃ upagatāyeva kathinatthāraṃ labhanti,
tika-vin09t:1192_13: Pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā,
tika-vin09t:1192_15: Keci pana “pañcavaggakaraṇīyattā ‘pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:1192_18: yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti campeyyakkhandhake vuttattā.
tika-vin09t:1192_20: yasmā ca sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā.
tika-vin09t:1192_23: Atha pana cattāro bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā,
tika-vin09t:1192_24: eko paripuṇṇavasso sāmaṇero sace pacchimikāya upasampajjati,
tika-vin09t:1194_3: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t:1194_7: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
tika-vin09t:1194_8: Yassāyasmato khamati imassa kathinadussassa itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dānaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t:1194_12: Dinnaṃ idaṃ saṅghena kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t:1195_2: So ca kho pubbakaraṇajānanādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:1196_1: Katamehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ?
tika-vin09t:1196_10: imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharitu”nti.
tika-vin09t:1197_5: Palibodho nāma āvāsapalibodho cīvarapalibodhoti dve palibodhā.
tika-vin09t:1198_0: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ “kathinaṃ pana kena attharitabbaṃ?
tika-vin09t:1198_6: Vuḍḍhesupi yo mahāpariso tadaheva cīvaraṃ katvā attharituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin09t:1198_11: Apica saṅghena mahātherassa saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t:1198_15: Dentena pana tīsu cīvaresu yaṃ yaṃ jiṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1198_21: “Ahaṃ alabhanto ekapaṭṭaṃ pārupāmī”ti vadantassāpi dupaṭṭaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1198_24: Tenāpi kathinaṃ attharitvā pacchā sibbetvā “dve cīvarāni karissāmī”ti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1199_2: Pañca vā atirekāni vā khaṇḍāni chinditvāti yathā pañcakhaṇḍikādīnaṃ saṅghāṭiādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarappahonakāni
tika-vin09t:1199_3: mahāmaṇḍalaaḍḍhamaṇḍalādivasena pañca khaṇḍāni vā atirekāni vā sattādikhaṇḍāni honti,
tika-vin09t:1199_5: Tasmiñca kathinacīvare kariyamāne “ahaṃ thero”ti vā “bahussuto”ti vā ekenāpi akātuṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin09t:1199_10: Sabbantimena paricchedena antaravāsakopi chinditvāva kātabbo aññathā atthāravipattito. Yathāha –
tika-vin09t:1200_4: na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnenā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1204_0: Evaṃ atthārakena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni anumodakehi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “tehipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1204_8: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti.
tika-vin09t:1204_12: atha kho aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarena vā antarubbhārena vā yāva kathinassubbhārā pañcānisaṃse labhanti,
tika-vin09t:1205_1: Tattha anāmantacāro nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantitassa santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā kulesu cārittāpajjanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1205_3: nāmenādhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānamaññataraṃ cīvaraṃ yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā aññattha aruṇuṭṭhāpananti attho,
tika-vin09t:1205_9: Gaṇoti cettha cattāro vā tatuttari vā bhikkhū.
tika-vin09t:1205_10: Tesaṃ viññattito vā nimantanato vā laddhassa odanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ aññatarabhojanassa saha gahaṇanti attho.
tika-vin09t:1205_11: Yo ca tattha cīvaruppādoti tattha kathinatthatasīmāya matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin09t:1205_12: saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena tatruppādena ābhataṃ vā yena kenaci ākārena yaṃ saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin09t:1206_0: “Yaṃ pana tattha saṅghassa uppannaṃ pattādi vā aññaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t:1206_2: Yaṃ pana tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthaṃ cetāpitaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1206_4: Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1206_5: tampi cetāpitakālato paṭṭhāya cīvaruppādo na hotīti suvuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1206_6: Anatthatakathinā pana imesu pañcasu ānisaṃsesu cīvaramāse asamādānacāraṃ ṭhapetvā sesānisaṃse labhanti.
tika-vin09t:1206_8: pāveyyakā bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā okapuṇṇehi cīvarehi na bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkameyyuṃ.
tika-vin09t:1206_10: tasmā cīvaramāsepi cīvaraṃ samādāya eva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin09t:1207_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā idāni ubbhāraṃ dassento “taṃ panetaṃ kathina”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1207_6: Tattha yo bhikkhu atthatakathino kathinacīvaraṃ ādāya tasmiṃ āvāse nirapekkho “na paccessa”nti pakkamati,
tika-vin09t:1207_7: tassevaṃ pakkamato kathinuddhāro atikkantamattāya sīmāya hotīti pakkamanantiko kathinuddhāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:1208_2: na puna taṃ vihāraṃ gacchissāmī”ti tasmiṃ āvāse nirapekkho hutvā taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti,
tika-vin09t:1209_0: Yadi pana ānisaṃsamūlacīvaraṃ ādāya bahisīmāgato “nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ karissāmi,
tika-vin09t:1209_1: na ca taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t:1210_0: Tadeva ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ laddhā taṃ ādāya bahisīmaṃ gantvā “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ karissāmi,
tika-vin09t:1210_1: na gacchissāmī”ti karontassa sace taṃ cīvaraṃ nassati vinassati ḍayhati,
tika-vin09t:1211_0: Sace pana ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ laddhā tasmiṃ vihāre sāpekkhova bahisīmāgato “vihāre bhikkhūhi antarubbhāraṃ kata”nti suṇāti,
tika-vin09t:1212_1: Yo pana yena kenaci “tuyhaṃ cīvaraṃ dassāmī”ti vutto tasmiṃ cīvare āsāya vihāre apekkhaṃ pahāya bahisīmāgato
tika-vin09t:1212_2: puna tena “na sakkomi dātu”nti vutte āsaṃ chindati,
tika-vin09t:1213_0: Yo pana vassaṃvuṭṭhavihārato aññaṃ vihāraṃ sāpekkhova gantvā āgacchanto antarāmaggeyeva kathinuddhāraṃ vītināmeti,
tika-vin09t:1214_1: Ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ ādāya sāpekkhova bahi gantvā kathinuddhāraṃ sambhuṇantassa kathinuddhāro sahubbhāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t:1215_0: “Etasmiṃ pana pakkamanantike kathinuddhāre paṭhamaṃ cīvarapalibodho chijjatī”tiādinā cīvarapalibodhupacchedādikassa
tika-vin09t:1215_2: Atthārubbhārānaṃyeva vā vitthāravinicchayassa tatthāgatattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1216_1: Dasāhaparamanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacananti āha “taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ kāla”nti.
tika-vin09t:1216_6: Kambalaṃ nāma manussalomavāḷalome ṭhapetvā sesalomehi vāyitvā katavatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1216_8: Bhaṅgaṃ nāma khomasuttādīhi pañcahi missetvā katavatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1216_10: Tadanulomānaṃ vāti dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ cīnapaṭṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti tesaṃ khomādīnaṃyeva anulomānaṃ channaṃ cīvarānaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t:1216_15: Imāni tīṇipi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin09t:1216_17: Taṃ pana khomādīnamaññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1216_19: taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1216_20: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin09t:1217_2: Aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulenāti ettha sugataṅgulaṃ nāma idāni majjhimassa purimassa tīṇi aṅgulāni,
tika-vin09t:1217_5: Yesaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ abhāvato adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā idaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t:1218_0: Taṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanaṃ kenākārena jānitabbanti anuyogaṃ sandhāya taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1218_1: Tattha yaṃ pana vuttanti atirekacīvaraṃ dassetuṃ “adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā”ti amhehi yaṃ vuttanti attho.
tika-vin09t:1218_3: Na vikappetunti saṅghāṭiādināmena vikappetuṃ na anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin09t:1218_5: Sāmaññavacanaṃ pana ticīvarassa kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikānaṃ viya kālavasena visesābhāvā cassa vikappetabbatāti dassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1218_7: Tathā hi purāṇacīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā navassa adhiṭṭhānavacanato,
tika-vin09t:1218_8: “anāpatti adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”tiādivacanato ca ticīvarassapi vikappanāya okāso dinno.
tika-vin09t:1218_10: Ticīvarādīni hi adhiṭṭhahantena “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1218_11: Vikappentena pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭi”ntiādinā tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1218_13: yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti,
tika-vin09t:1218_16: Tato paraṃ vikappetunti catumāsato paraṃ “imaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetuṃ.
tika-vin09t:1218_18: Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ catumāsaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1218_21: “Imāsañca pana vassikasāṭikakaṇḍupaṭicchādīnaṃ tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā tathāvikappitaṃ
tika-vin09t:1218_23: Adhiṭṭhātabbavikappetabbatā jānitabbāti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ vikappetabbanti evaṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanā jānitabbāti attho.
tika-vin09t:1219_3: Pārupanenapi sakkā nābhiṃ paṭicchādetunti āha “dvihatthopi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin09t:1219_10: “Imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti evampi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1219_13: Idañhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena aphusantassa na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1219_17: Sāmantavihāreti yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin09t:1219_22: Na hi ṭhapitaṭṭhānamattasallakkhaṇena kiñci payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin09t:1220_1: Adhiṭṭhānato pubbe saṅghāṭiādivohārassa abhāvato “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccattharaṇādīnaṃ visuṃ paccuddharaṇavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t:1220_2: Paccattharaṇādināmena pana adhiṭṭhātabbattā “imaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ paccuddharāmī”tiādinā vuttepi nevatthi doso.
tika-vin09t:1220_4: Parikkhāracoḷakassa pana parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitavatthehipi saṅghāṭiādimhi kate paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti natthi.
tika-vin09t:1220_6: Adhiṭṭhitena pana tena saddhiṃ mahantatarameva dutiyaṃ paṭṭaṃ vā khaṇḍaṃ vā saṃsibbantena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1220_7: same vā khuddake vā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin09t:1220_8: Sukhaparibhogatthanti vippavāsadosābhāvato yattha katthaci ṭhapetvā dhammassavanādinā kiccena aññattha
tika-vin09t:1220_9: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā āgantvā nissajjanaṃ vināva paribhuñjituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya sukhaparibhogatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1221_3: hemantassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe vassikasāṭikāvassikasāṭikabhāvato apanetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t:1221_4: tuyhaṃ vikappemī”tiādinā nayena vikappetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1221_6: kaṇḍupaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti vakkhamānattā vassānamāsato paraṃ asati adhiṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t:1222_0: Keci pana “yathā kathinamāsabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1222_2: Tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ hemantassa paṭhamadivase vikappetabbāti evamattho gahetabbo,
tika-vin09t:1222_3: paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ vikappetabbāti padayojanā veditabbā”ti ca vadanti,
tika-vin09t:1222_5: Kathinamāse uppannañhi cīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā avasānadivase anadhiṭṭhitaṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1222_6: Ayaṃ pana vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitattā na tena sadisāti vassānātikkame kathaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti
tika-vin09t:1222_7: anadhiṭṭhitaavikappitameva hi taṃ kālātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1222_9: Evaṃ kaṇḍupaṭicchādipi adhiṭṭhānavijahanato paraṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ labhati.
tika-vin09t:1222_11: Nahānatthāya anuññātattā vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1222_12: “Dve pana na vaṭṭantī”ti dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1223_1: vitthārato diyaḍḍhaṃ dasā vidatthī”ti iminā pamāṇena yuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1223_11: Bhagavatā hi yaṃ yaṃ bhikkhū labhanti,
tika-vin09t:1223_12: taṃ taṃ iminā vidhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā puna “yena yena parissāvanādinā attho hoti,
tika-vin09t:1223_13: taṃ taṃ katvā gaṇhantū”ti anukampāya anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1223_15: Ādisaddena “etāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhāmī”ti asammukhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t:1223_16: “Senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe cā”ti iminā attano santakaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t:1223_18: apārupitvā ca kevalaṃ pañcapīṭhesuyeva attharitvā paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t:1223_19: taṃ ayuttaṃ senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinna”nti paccattharaṇassa visesitattā.
tika-vin09t:1224_0: Adhiṭṭhitañca panetaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjato kathaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti āha “sabbañca paneta”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t:1224_1: Tattha acchinditvā gahaṇenāti corādīhi acchinditvā gahaṇena.
tika-vin09t:1224_4: “sīlavantova hutvā gihī bhavissāmī”ti setavatthanivāsanenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1224_5: “Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa setavatthanivāso vā kāsāyacajanaṃ vā hīnāyāvattana”nti keci.
tika-vin09t:1224_6: “‘Hīnāyāvattanenā’ti iminā bhikkhuniyā eva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ gahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1224_9: Bhikkhu pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin09t:1224_10: tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī”ti apare.
tika-vin09t:1224_12: Yo hi bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti,
tika-vin09t:1225_2: Yo pana dubbalaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā pacchā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā apaneti,
tika-vin09t:1225_5: Dupaṭṭassa pana ekasmiṃ paṭale chidde vā jāte,
tika-vin09t:1225_10: Ubho koṭiyo majjhe karonto sace pana paṭhamaṃ chinditvā pacchā ghaṭeti,
tika-vin09t:1225_14: Rajakehi dhovāpetvā setaṃ karontassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānameva.
tika-vin09t:1225_17: Tena na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttena dānādinā aṭṭhavidheneva kāraṇena vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin09t:1225_18: atha kho vassānamāsātikkamenapīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t:1226_3: Tassa yo aruṇoti tassa cīvaruppādadivasassa yo atikkanto aruṇo.
tika-vin09t:1226_9: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti tasmiṃ nissajjane ayaṃ vidhi.
tika-vin09t:1226_20: Iminā ca attano āyatiṃ saṃvare patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dvīsu,
tika-vin09t:1226_21: pana sambahulāsu vāti dvīsu vā sambahulāsu vā āpattīsu purimanayeneva vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t:1226_22: Ñattiyaṃ āpattiṃ sarati vivaratīti ettha “dve āpattiyo”ti vā “sambahulā āpattiyo”ti vā vacanabhedo kātabbo. Dvīsu,
tika-vin09t:1226_23: bahūsu vā vacanabhedo kātabboti “saṅgho imāni cīvarānī”ti vatthuvasena vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t:1227_0: Evaṃ saṅghassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetvā gaṇassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇassa pana nissajjantenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t:1227_2: vuttavacanabhedaṃ vinā avasesaṃ saṅghassa nissajjanādīsu vuttasadisamevāti attho.
tika-vin09t:1228_0: Idāni puggalassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “puggalassa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1228_3: tīsu vā āpattīsu ceva dātabbacīvaresu ca.
tika-vin09t:1228_12: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā”tiādinā nayena tiṇṇaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ vatvā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin09t:1228_18: therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅga”ntiādinā nayena visuṃyeva dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho vutto,
tika-vin09t:1228_21: tasmā avatvāva gatoti gaṇassa vuttā pāḷiyevettha pāḷi.
tika-vin09t:1228_23: yathā gaṇassa nissajjitvā āpattiyā desiyamānāya āpattippaṭiggāhako bhikkhu ñattiṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t:1228_24: evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā dvīsu aññatarena yathā ekapuggalo paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t:1228_29: Nissaṭṭhacīvaradānepi yathā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti eko vadati,
tika-vin09t:1228_30: evaṃ “mayaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato demā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t:1228_31: Ito garukatarānipi hi ñattidutiyakammāni apaloketvā kātabbānīti vuttāni atthi,
tika-vin09t:1228_37: Na taṃ tena saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dinnameva hoti.
tika-vin09t:1229_0: Anissajjitvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭanti sakiṃ nivatthaṃ vā sakiṃ pārutaṃ vā kāyato amocetvā divasampi carati,
tika-vin09t:1229_4: Dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā saṇṭhāpentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t:1229_8: vematikassa ca dukkaṭanti etthāpi “paribhuñjantassā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1229_9: Atikkante anatikkantasaññinopīti dasāhaṃ atikkante cīvare “anatikkantaṃ ida”nti evaṃ saññino,
tika-vin09t:1229_10: dasāhe vā atikkante “anatikkanto dasāho”ti evaṃ saññino.
tika-vin09t:1230_1: Tathāti yathā dasāhaṃ atikkante saññābhedena tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1230_2: tathā anadhiṭṭhitādīsu sattasu vikappesu adhiṭṭhitādisaññābhedatoti attho.
tika-vin09t:1230_3: Tattha avissajjite vissajjitasaññinoti kassaci adinne apariccatte “dinnaṃ pariccattaṃ mayā”ti evaṃ saññino.
tika-vin09t:1230_4: Anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññinoti attano cīvarena saddhiṃ bahūni aññesaṃ cīvarāni ekato ṭhapitāni,
tika-vin09t:1230_6: tatresa attano cīvare anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññī hoti,
tika-vin09t:1230_9: Avilutteti ettha pana gabbhaṃ bhinditvā pasayhāvahāravasena avilutteti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1231_14: tava santakaṃ karissasī”ti vutte “mama santakaṃ karomi,
tika-vin09t:1231_21: Sace pana “tava santakaṃ karohī”ti vutte “sādhu, bhante,
tika-vin09t:1231_38: evaṃ me kappiyaṃ hotī”ti vatvā vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1231_39: Na hi evaṃ jānāpetvā vinayakammaṃ karontassa musāvādo hoti.
tika-vin09t:1232_1: evaṃ ito parānipīti yathā idaṃ atirekacīvaradhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ ācāravipatti,
tika-vin09t:1232_2: evaṃ ito parānipi sikkhāpadāni ācāravipattiyevāti attho.
tika-vin09t:1232_4: Ājīvavipattipaccayā pana ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ cha āpattikkhandhā paññattāti –
tika-vin09t:1233_0: “Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati,
tika-vin09t:1233_7: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t:1233_9: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t:1233_11: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t:1234_0: Evaṃ pārājikādivasena ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ ājīvavipattipaccayā cha āpattikkhandhā paññattā.
tika-vin09t:1234_1: Diṭṭhivipattipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā paññattāti samanubhāsanāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissajjane ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1234_2: kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyanti evaṃ diṭṭhivipattipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā paññattā.
tika-vin09t:1235_1: Aññehi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa demā”ti parahatthe dinnampi “na tāva taṃ gaṇanupagaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1235_2: yāva na hatthaṃ gacchatī”ti cammakkhandhake vuttattā yāva āharitvā vā na dinnaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1235_14: citte pana sati kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t:1235_17: Kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca kattabbākaraṇato kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1238_3: Atha kasmā karaṇavaseneva karaṇavacanassa atthaṃ aggahetvā sāmivasena attho veditabboti āha “karaṇavasena hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t:1238_11: Ekena vippavutthopi hi ticīvarena vippavuttho nāma hoti paṭisiddhapariyāpannena vippavutthattā,
tika-vin09t:1239_1: Tattha nivesananti udositādīnaṃ vasena akatāya patissayavikatiyā adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1239_4: Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso.
tika-vin09t:1239_6: yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hotī”ti apare.
tika-vin09t:1239_21: Vihāroti saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāso.
tika-vin09t:1239_23: Nivesanādīni cettha gāmato bahi niviṭṭhāni gahitāni.
tika-vin09t:1239_24: Antogāme ṭhitānaṃ pana gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitattā gāmaparihāroyevāti.
tika-vin09t:1239_26: Hatthapāsātikkameti ettha hatthapāso nāma aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇo padeso,
tika-vin09t:1239_30: Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā sacepi iddhimā bhikkhu ākāse aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin09t:1240_1: sace gāmo ekassa rañño vā bhojakassa vā vasena ekakulassa hoti,
tika-vin09t:1240_3: evarūpe gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā tasmiṃ gāmabbhantare yathārucitaṭṭhāne vasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1240_7: tassa gharassa samantato hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1241_0: Sace gāmo vesālikusinārādayo viya nānārājūnaṃ vā bhojakānaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin09t:1241_2: evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1241_4: tassa gharassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1241_6: tassā vīthiyā tassa gharassa sammukhāṭṭhāne sabhāyaṃ vā gharadvāre vā vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1241_7: tesaṃ sabhādvārānaṃ hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1242_2: tattha vā tassa hatthapāse vā vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1242_3: Nivesane pana sace ekakulassa nivesanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1242_9: tassa gabbhassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1243_4: sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇadvāramūle vā tesaṃ gabbhadvāramūlānaṃ hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1243_8: tassa gabbhassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1244_3: satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabbā,
tika-vin09t:1244_5: Sace sattho gacchanto gāmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t:1244_6: antopaviṭṭhena saddhiṃ ekābaddho hutvā orañca pārañca pharitvā ṭhito hoti,
tika-vin09t:1244_8: Atha gāme vā nadiyā vā pariyāpanno hoti antopaviṭṭho,
tika-vin09t:1245_7: antokhette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1246_0: Rukkhamūle pana yaṃ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
tika-vin09t:1246_1: tasmiṃ ṭhāne aviraḷe padese tassa chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa antoyeva nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1246_2: Sace viraḷasākhassa rukkhassa ātapena phuṭṭhokāse ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t:1246_3: aruṇuggamane ca so bhikkhu tassa hatthapāse na hoti,
tika-vin09t:1247_0: Ajjhokāse pana viñjhāṭaviādīsu araññesupi samuddamajjhe macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathadīpakesupi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t:1247_1: ṭhapetvā tato samantā sattabbhantare padese yattha katthaci vasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t:1247_2: ito aññattha vasanto vippavuttho nāma hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t:1248_4: Ettha pana pāḷiyaṃ “gāmo ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādinā avisesena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvāpi gāmanivesanaudositakhettadhaññakaraṇaārāmavihārānaṃ
tika-vin09t:1248_5: ekūpacāranānūpacāratā “gāmo ekūpacāro nāma ekakulassa gāmo hoti parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto cā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t:1248_8: nānākulassa aṭṭo hotī”tiādinā nayena ekakulanānākulavasena ca ante “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāma agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā ekūpacāro,
tika-vin09t:1248_9: tato paraṃ nānūpacāroti ca evaṃ ekūpacāranānūpacāratā vibhattā.
tika-vin09t:1248_18: “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro”ti ettha samantā sattabbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ pamāṇanti apare.
tika-vin09t:1249_0: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti bhikkhuno saṅghena dinnā sammuti bhikkhusammuti,
tika-vin09t:1250_5: Antoaruṇe paccuddhaṭeti nivattitvā sampāpuṇitumasakkontena tattheva ṭhatvā anto aruṇe paccuddhaṭe.
tika-vin09t:1250_8: Yato paṭṭhāya hi satthaṃ vā pariyesati,
tika-vin09t:1250_11: “Na dāni gamissāmī”ti evaṃ pana dhuranikkhepaṃ karontena paccuddharitabbaṃ “atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhassatī”ti.
tika-vin09t:1250_13: Soti yassa sammuti dinnā, so rogo.
tika-vin09t:1251_1: Vippavāso nāma yadi baddhasīmāyaṃ cīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t:1251_5: Baddhasīmāyaṃ pana yattha katthaci cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā antosīmāyameva yattha katthaci vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
